loans.name: Museyib

texts.en:
Museyib is a 45-year-old farmer who is married and the father of two sons. The sphere of his engagement is cropping and livestock. There are three cows, one calf, and 12 sheep in herd. Additionally, he has been engaged in masonry and plaster work to earn extra money. One of his sons does video and photo shooting at different parties and, with the income, helps him. 

Because of his wife's health, now he cannot do additional work in another place. He wants to increase the number of animals to improve the living conditions of the family with earnings from agriculture. He also wants to finish the construction of the stall, as it was built from rods.
 
Museyib has applied for the loan to buy barley, feed, three sheep with lambs, and medicine for the cattle. 

He thanks all who do such a big help to the people in need.

loans.use: to buy barley, feed, three sheep with lambs, and medicine for the cattle.

loans.name: Julita Andrea

texts.es:
Julita de 33 años, es ama de casa, dedicada al cuidado de sus dos hijos menores de edad, debido a su condición económica, decidió buscar nuevos ingresos a fin de mejorar su condición de vida y garantizarles a sus hijos una mejor educación.  Por su bajo nivel educativo le han cerrado las puertas para acceder al mundo laboral, por lo cual decidió crear su propio negocio gracias a la colaboración de su madre que le facilitó el capital para iniciar con la venta de ropa en su municipio. Diariamente se levanta temprano para enviar a sus hijos al colegio, realiza las labores domésticas y sale en búsqueda de nuevos clientes. De esta manera Julita se gana la vida para sostener a su familia.

Su mayor sueño es poder  tener una vivienda para ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. Motivada por este propósito, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará para la compra de mercancía.
texts.en:
Julita, 33, is a housewife who takes care of her two minor children.  Because of her economic situation, she decided to look for new income to improve her living conditions and guarantee her children a better education.  Because of her low educational level, the doors to the working world have been closed to her, so she decided to create her own business thanks to the help of her mother, who gave her some capital to start selling clothing in her town.

She gets up early every day to send her children to school.  She does the domestic chores and goes out to look for new customers.  This way Julita earns a living to support her family.

Her biggest dream is to be able to have a house to give her children a better quality of life.  Motivated by this goal, she's requesting a loan to buy merchandise.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth has had a hotel business in the Nairobi area for five years. She is 42 years old and married with two children, ages 18 and 14.

This will be her fourth loan from KADET LTD. She plans to use the amount to buy more stock of foodstuffs such as cooking fat, rice and wheat flour for sale. She also plans to buy more plates, cups and spoons. She will use the generated income to renovate and expand her hotel so as to accommodate more customers.

Elizabeth hopes to open a restaurant in the future.

loans.use: To buy more stock of foodstuffs as well as more plates, cups and spoons.

loans.name: Mouhammad

texts.en:
Mouhammad is from Iraq. He is a youth client who is 23 years old. He is married and is a father of two children. Mouhammad is the only provider for his family.

Mouhammad is a motorcycle mechanic who also sells engines and other spare parts for motorcycles. He established his business in 2010. He has good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation.

Mouhammad is requesting a sum of $2,400 to renovate his shop and increase his inventory. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and increase his inventory.

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is 38 years old, married and supports a family of six. She has been blessed with four children aged 18, 17, 12 and 10. Her children are in school.

Hellen is a hardworking lady and is always ready to support her family. She operates a Curio shop in the market, and has been in this business for the last eight years, comfortably making a monthly income of KES 42,000. 

She is requesting her fourth loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy more products to sell in her Curio shop. She will use the anticipated profits to invest in crop farming, as this is the main economic activity in the region.

She has the dream of growing her business, so she can earn extra income to support her family and build more houses to rent.

loans.use: to purchase more products for her Curio shop

loans.name: Rasim

texts.en:
Rasim is fifty one years old and married with five children; the oldest is 19 and the youngest are four-year-old twins. They live in northeastern Albania and their main activity and source of income for the past eighteen something years has been livestock and poultry. They have been selling milk, baby calves, chicken and eggs; all organic. 

“We have been experiencing a growth in our business and we are happy. That tells us something; there is a strong demand for our products due to our good services. Yet we work very hard both, and for my wife having to look after all the kids and also animals, it hasn’t been easy at all,” Rasim said.
 
Rasim is now requesting a loan for the first time to build a proper stable.

loans.use: To build a stable for his animals.

loans.name: Juan Sebastián

texts.es:
Juan Sebastián de 18 años de edad, ha demostrado que en la vida solo se necesita motivación y una oportunidad para salir adelante. Gracias a un capital que le regaló su padre, este joven no dudó en comenzar con su proyecto de negocio. Montó un café internet, después de analizar el sector en donde vive y darse cuenta de la necesidad. 
Sus sueños apenas comienzan y como se perfila como un gran administrador de su microempresa, decidió estudiar mantenimiento y reparación de equipos de cómputo con el propósito de ahorrar costos y ofrecer este servicio en su negocio. Su mayor negocio es poder mejorar su servicio y garantizarles a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de películas de video juegos y compra de útiles escolares, con el fin de ampliar su portafolio de servicios.
texts.en:
Juan Sebastián, who is 18 years old, is living proof that all that is needed in life is motivation and opportunity. Thanks to some small capital that his father gave him, this young man did not hesitate to initiate his business project: he opened an internet café after studying the area where he lives and realizing the potential demand for this service.

His dreams are now becoming true and since he has the potential to become a good manager in his own business, he decided to study repair and maintenance of computers in order to decrease operational costs and offer this additional service. His biggest dream is to be able to improve his service and provide his parents with a better quality of life.

Juan Sebastián is now thinking of expanding his portfolio and requests a loan to invest in video games and school supplies.

loans.use: to buy video games and school supplies.

loans.name: Altin

texts.en:
Altin is a 27-year-old man from southern part of Albania who worked in Greece until recently. He is married, has a one-year-old daughter, and is expecting another daughter soon; when he found out Altin could not hide his excitement.

His family, meaning his parents, owns land where they planted for ten full years. They received a good income from it; however, Altin has decided to turn it into a more fruitful investment. This year he has already planted fruit trees, veggies, potatoes, grains, crops for the animals, etc.

Altin is positive that his hard work will pay off at the end, yet, all what he needs at the moment is a loan of 80,000 Albanian Lek to buy some organic fertilizers for the seedlings.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers for the seedlings

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en: Nancy is a 44-years-old woman from Nakuru and is married with two children, who are aged 10 years old and 6 years old. Nancy has a cereals business that she has been running for the past three years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy sugar, wheat and maize flour to add to her stock for sale. She hopes to own a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: To buy sugar, wheat and maize flour

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is from Iraq. He is a 34-years-old man, who is  married and has two children. Ahmad is the sole provider for his family. Ahmad owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He established his business in 2007. He has built up good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation. hmad is requesting for a $3,000 loan to buy a new motor generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so that he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a new motor generator

loans.name: Gina

texts.en: Gina earns a living through her food vending business. She sells home-cooked snack foods to the people in her place in Bohol, Philippines. Gina needs a loan to buy additional ingredients for food vending such as flour, sugar, butter and milk. With this, she will be able to cook and sell more snack foods to her customers, thus augmenting her sales and profit. In the future, Gina hopes to make her business a success. She also plans to explore another venture in order to augment her income. Moreover, Gina wants to continue supporting her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for food vending such as flour, sugar, butter and milk

loans.name: Basem

texts.en: Basem is from Iraq. He is 38 years old, married and has four children. Basem is the only provider of his family. Basem is a nurse. He specializes in sterilizing wounds. He established his business in 2010. He has built a good level of experience in this field and he is well known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation. Basem is requesting a loan of $2,100 to buy an air conditioner and some equipment related to his job. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so that he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy an air conditioner and some equipment related to his job

loans.name: Yeremiah

texts.en:
Yeremiah is a 25-year-old year old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda. Two years ago he decided to start a retail shop to supplement his salon business which he still runs. Yeremiah's greatest business challenges are price fluctuations and inadequate capital to meet his high customer demand.

Yeremiah is requesting a loan to pay school fees for his children. In the future, he hopes to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 38 years old and married with four children. He is from Iraq. Ali and his wife provide the income for the family. Since 2007, Ali has owned a small shop where he sells women's clothing and accessories. He has earned good experience in his field and is well known in the surrounding areas. Ali has an excellent reputation.

Ali is requesting a 1,800 USD loan to renovate his shop. His aim is to expand his business and increase his profits to improve his current life conditions and provide a good future for his children.

loans.use: to renovate his shop

loans.name: Milly's Group

texts.en:
Milly is 42 years old and married with three children. She lives in the Philippines.  For the past 10 years, Milly has been a farmer who grows pigs and cows to earn a living.  She has been a member of PMPC for four years.

Milly is requesting a loan to buy more pigs and cows to raise. In the future, she hopes to build a shed for her animals.

loans.use: to raise pigs and cows

location.town: Pagadian - Lower Bagong Silang Pagadian City

loans.name: Maximeno

texts.en:
Maximeno is 72 years old and married with five children. He lives in Lupagan, Clarin, Philippines. For the past ten years, Maximeno has worked in the fish industry and he sells fish for a living. He has been a member of PMPC for four years.

Maximeno is requesting a loan to purchase feed for his fishpond business. In the future, he hopes to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase food for his fishpond business

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a 32-years-old man from Olkalou, and is married with two children who are aged seven years and three years old. George has a retail shop which he has been running for the past three years. He has applied for his third loan from KADET LTD to enable him buy sugar, a box of bar soap, rice and flour to add to his sale stock. He hopes to buy a plot in the near future and enlarge his shop.

loans.use: To buy sugar, a  box of bar soap, rice and flour

loans.name: Marilyn's Group

texts.en:
Marilyn is 44 years old and married with five school-aged children. She lives in Tinago, Ozamis City. She runs a general store where she sells a variety of products such as tea, coffee, soap, cosmetics, and other items. Marilyn earns about 10,000 PHP each month and has been a member of PMPC for three years.

Marilyn is requesting a 40,000 PHP loan to purchase products such as coffee, tea, herbal products, soaps, cosmetics, and other items. In the future, she would like to expand her business and support her children in their studies.

loans.use: to purchase coffee, tea, herbal products, soaps, cosmetics, and other items

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
For two years Alice, a 40-year-old married mother of five children living in Masindi-Uganda, has been selling agricultural produce which she gets from her garden and also buys from other farmers in the neighborhood. Price fluctuation and seasonal weather changes pose a challenge to her business growth.

Alice intends to use this loan to buy produce such as maize and beans to sell. Her dream is to own a food store that can meet her customers' needs year round.

loans.use: to buy produce such as maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Sharifeh

texts.en:
Sharifa is a 51-year-old married woman from Lebanon. She is living with her husband and one child. 

In 1992, in order to supplement the family’s income, she decided to start her own work as a farmer. Her job consists of cultivating tobacco. She takes  good care of her land and knows very well how to deal with the problems that occur.  

As for her husband, he’s a taxi driver and the one covering the family expenses.

Today, she is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase the required agricultural tools and supplies, seeds and fertilizers. She states that the loan will certainly help her increase her business productivity by a fair percentage, which will return higher profits. 

In the future, she plans to take more Kiva loans and expand her lands by cultivating a wider variety of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase the required agricultural tools and supplies, seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 53 years old and married with one school-aged child. She lives in Bitaug, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. For the past 20 years, she has raised pigs. Elsie earns 7,000 PHP each month to help cover her living costs. She has been a member of PMPC for almost a year.

Elsie is requesting a 7,000 PHP loan to purchase additional piglets and feed. She hopes to expand her business with the help of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase piglets and feed

loans.name: Jeffrey

texts.en: Jeffrey, a farmer from Ubay, Bohol, Philippines, has been in the rice farming business, his sole source of income, for more than two years now. Jeffrey is requesting a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides in order to increase his harvest and yield. He hopes to expand his farm In the future and save money for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian, debido a la temporada escolar que se acerca, quiere realizar una nueva inversión al negocio, por eso está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de zapatos escolares, al mismo tiempo comprara sandalias, chancletas, tambien lácteos como el queso y crema. 
Ella considera que los préstamos le ha mejorado el negocio, manteniendo clientes satisfechos y mejoras económicas, y logro comprar algunos productos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Due to the approaching school year, Lilian wants to make a new investment in her business. For this reason she is requesting a new loan to buy school shoes, and at the same time, to buy sandals, flip-flips, and also dairy products such as cheese and cream.
She considers that the loans have improved her business in maintaining satisfied customers, increasing income, and obtaining some products for the home.

loans.use: to buy school shoes, sandals, and flip-flops.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 23 years old and married with an infant child. She presently lives in Bitaug, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. Jovelyn has recently started a general store where she sells products such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, and salt. She earns 5,000 PHP each month to go to her family's daily living expenses. Jovelyn has been a member of PMPC for almost a year.

Jovelyn is requesting a 14,900 PHP loan to purchase different products such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, and salt for her store. She hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, toothpaste, soap, sugar, and salt

loans.name: Ryad

texts.en:
Ryad is from Iraq. He is a youth client of 27 years of age, who is married and is a father of a single child. Ryad is the only provider of his family.
Ryad owns an upholstery. He specializes in making pillows and beds. He established his business in 2007, and now he has an employee. He has built good experience in this field and he is well known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation. Ryad is requesting a youth loan of $3,000 to expand and renovate his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to expand and renovate his shop

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha is a 53-years-old woman from Ndunyu Njeru and is married with three children, who are all in school. Martha has a farming business that she has been doing for the past five years. She has applied for her third loan from KADET LTD to enable her buy seedlings, fertilizers and pesticides for use on her farm. She hopes to be the leading farmer in her area.

loans.use: To buy seedlings, fertilizers and pesticides for use on her farm.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is 31 years old and single. He is from Iraq. Haydar works as a barber. After taking many courses in this field, and working as a barbershop employee, he gained enough experience to open his own shop, which he established in 2004. He has good experience in his field and is well known in the surrounding areas. Haydar has an excellent reputation.

Haydar is requesting a 1,200 USD loan to renovate his shop and buy a new chair for cutting hair. In the future, he hopes to expand his business and increase his profits to provide better living conditions for himself.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and buy a new chair for cutting hair

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 52 years old and married with an 18-year-old child. She lives with her family in Bitaug, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. For the past 31 years, Marcelina has worked buying and selling fish. She has been a member of PMPC for almost a year and she has good credit.

Marcelina is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan to purchase fish.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell

loans.name: Haik

texts.en:
Haik, who lives in Tegh village with his wife and two children, is involved in cattle breeding. He keeps ten chickens, four pigs and five cows. His income is gathered from selling milk and meat in local markets. Haik is also a lecturer at Goris State University, but his monthly income is only enough to cover the family's daily costs.

Farm expansion is very important for Haik, so he has requested this loan to help him purchase two cows and forage to feed them. This expansion in agricultural activity will make his family's life better.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and forage to feed them.

loans.name: Emigdio De Jesus

texts.es:
Emigdio, se decidió por solicitar un nuevo préstamo, para invertir en el negocio y poder continuar fortaleciéndolo, pues adquirirá cuatro cerdos, los cuales formaran parte de la granja, para poderlos engordar, esto será un gran aporte para que su negocio permanezca. 
El considera que los préstamos le han ayudado para mantener la granja y ofrecer a los clientes los cerdos, esto le ha dado ganancia, mejorando sus circunstancias familiares, viviendo mejor que antes.
texts.en:
Emigdio has decided to request a new loan, in order to invest in his business and continue strengthening it. He will acquire four pigs for his farm so that he can fatten them up. This will be a great contribution toward the continuation of his business. 

He considers that the loans have helped him maintain his farm and offer pigs to his customers. This has provided him with profits and allowed him to improve his family's circumstances, so that they are living better than before.

loans.use: to buy four pigs.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is married. She is 58 years old and lives in New Dapitan, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Rosa owns rubber land and this is the source of her income to earn a living. She has been doing this for 15 years. She has requested a loan to purchase materials for her rubber farm.

Rosa  has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Rosa hopes to develop her rubber land well.

loans.use: to purchase materials for rubber farm

location.town: Liloy-New Dapitan, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de Alto Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz; no tiene hijos pero colabora con los gastos de su casa ya que tiene varios hermanos menores. El crédito que solicitó lo requiere para pagar sus estudios universitarios y poder terminar su carrera.

Trabaja como cajera en una institución financiera donde es requisito importante tener una licenciatura para poder postular a un mejor cargo. 

El sueño de Daniela es independizarse y poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Es primera vez que solicita crédito en Impro y Kiva.
texts.en:
Daniela is single, and she lives in her parents’ house in the Alto Sopocachi area of the city of La Paz.  She does not have children, but she helps with the household expenses because she has several minor siblings.

She needs the loan she requested to pay for her university studies and to be able to finish her degree.

She works as a teller at a financial institution where having a degree is an important requirement for a better position.

Daniela’s dream is to become independent and to be able to improve her quality of life.

This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for her university studies and to be able to finish her degree in order to get a better position at work.

loans.name: Chari

texts.en:
Chari is a 43-years-old married woman with three children, all of whom are in school and live together with her family. She is a farmer of basic grains such as maize and beans, as well as feeder animals. She is a very enterprising and admirable woman. She never tires of her daily work since she has the desire to fulfill her dreams. Every time a crop comes to harvest, she sells a part of it, and the other part she keeps for her family's daily consumption.
She has worked all her life in agriculture, and it is in this way that she has been able to survive. Due to her visionary and enterprising spirit within her, she has a loan request amounting to ksh.25000 to use for purchase of various farming supplies such as seeds, insecticides and fertilizers. This is so that she can begin preparing to sow seeds as soon as possible and be able to achieve her needs. She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to use for purchase of various farming supplies such as seeds, insecticides and fertilizers

loans.name: Anwar

texts.en: Anwar is from Iraq. He is a youth client aged 21 years old, who is single and lives with his relative. Anwar owns a small shop selling electrical goods. He established his business in 2011, and now he has an employee. He has built good experiences in this field and he is well known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation. Anwar is requesting a youth loan of $2,000 to renovate his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he will be able to provide himself with a good career path.

loans.use: to renovate his shop

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 36-years-old man from Nakuru, and is married with three children, who are aged between 13 years and 2 years old. Robert is a scrap dealer and has been in this line for the past eight years. He has applied for his second loan from KADET LTD to enable him buy a dairy cow for his wife who is a dairy farmer. He hopes to expand his business in the near future.

loans.use: To buy another cow

loans.name: Ida

texts.en:
Ida is 55 years old and married with two children who are 16 and 18 years old. She lives with her family in Binoongan, Enrique Villanueva, Siquijor. For a long time, around 12 years, Ida has run a snack-selling business. She earns 7,000 PHP each month selling food and snacks and uses her profit to help cover her family's living expenses. Ida is a good-paying member of PMPC.

Ida is requesting a loan to purchase the ingredients she needs to make food to sell. In the future, she hopes to expand her business with the help of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make food to sell

loans.name: Jargalsaihan

texts.en: Mrs. Jargalsaihan is a 37-year-old widow who lives alone in an apartment in Selenge province of Mongolia. Her daughter has gotten married and lives separately with her family. Mrs. Jargalsaihan has been working as tailor for years and started her own business of a tailoring service at home in 1995. She is now requesting 500,000 MNT to purchase inventory to run her tailoring business and meet the order request she has received. She is hardworking, well-behaved and a strong woman.

loans.use: to purchase inventory to run her tailoring business

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 60 years old and he has operated a retail business in Olkalou town for the last two years. He is married to Mary, who is a farmer, and together they have four children.

John was introduced to KADET LTD by one of the existing clients and this will be his second loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use this loan to buy more stock of sugar, tea leaves, cooking fat and baking flour for sale.

In the future, John hopes to grow his business and make more income and, thereafter, buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, tea leaves, cooking fat and baking flour.

loans.name: Houmayda

texts.en: Houmayda is from Iraq. She is 50 years old, married and has three children. Houmayda is the only provider of her family. Houmayda is a tailor. She established her business in 2011. She has built good experiences in this field and she is well known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation. Houmayda is requesting a loan of $3,000 to buy 3 tailoring machines. She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits, so she will be able to provide her family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy 3 tailoring machines

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a 41-years-old woman from Ndunyu Njeru, and is married with three children, who are all in school. Jane has a farming business that she has been running for the past six years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD to enable her buy fertilizers and seedlings for use on her farm. She hopes to buy a piece of land in the near future and to be able to raise her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seedlings

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is a 54-year-old married woman from Bohol, Philippines. She is married and has three grown up children. Gloria earns a living through her sari-sari or variety store business. Gloria wants to expand her business but lacks the financial resources to do so. With this, she joined CEVI to gain access to the loan services offered by the organization for small entrepreneurs like her. She is applying for a loan to buy additional stocks to sell such as canned goods, candies, rice, snack foods, soap, toiletries and beverages. Gloria believes that this loan could be a great help for her in improving her store.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell such as canned goods, candies, rice, snack foods, soap, toiletries and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy two cows and supplies like manure, herbicides, and seeds.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is 64 years old, married and has a single child. Ali is the only provider of the family.

Ali owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He established his business in 2006. He built a good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation. Ali is requesting a sum of 2,500 USD to buy a motor generator and to increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to open a bigger supermarket in order to secure his child’s future.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator and to increase his inventory

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 52 years old and lives in Poblacion, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with three children.

Rosario works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for 30 years. She has requested a loan to purchase boxes of fish to sell. Rosario has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for two years. In the future, Rosario hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia is 60 years old and lives in Lamao, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married, with five children.

Eufemia works in the fish industry and sells/catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for 20 years. She has requested a loan to purchase more stocks of fish to sell. Eufemia has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for two years. In the future, Eufemia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of fish to sell.

loans.name: Juana Daysi

texts.es:
Juana, vive con sus dos hijos de 15 y 17 años de edad, su esposo tiene 59 años, ella realiza el trabajo de sastrería, de este ayuda a su hogar, ella realiza esta labor desde hace 20 años, lo aprendió de su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de telas en variedad, tambien hilo en diferentes colores, ciper y otros accesorios de costura, esto le ayudara al fortalecimiento del negocio, mejorando su condición.
La aspiración de Juana es tener más rentabilidad con el negocio, darles el estudio a sus hijos para que se superen.
texts.en:
Juana lives with her two children, aged 15 and 17. Her husband is 59 years old. She works as a tailor, and this work helps support her household. She has done this work for 20 years, and she learned it from family members. 

She is requesting a loan to buy a variety of fabrics as well as thread in different colors, zippers and other tailoring supplies. This will help her strengthen her business and improve her situation. 

Juana's aspiration is to make her business more profitable and to provide her children with a university education so that they can get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fabrics, thread, zippers, and other items.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda is a forty-nine-year old married woman with six children living in Kasese,Uganda.She has been in the retail shop business for three years. She started the business in order to supplement her monthly salary, which could not ably facilitate her in meeting the day to day needs of her family. As the good mother that she is, she desires to educate her children up to the University level, and to set up sustainable income generating activities for them. Imelda is requesting for a loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to pay the school fees of her children

loans.name: Emilyn

texts.en:
This is Emilyn, 36 years old, a resident of Cabrera, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Danilo, a butcher and is a mother to their children. She and her husband manage their household while operating their business. She is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Emilyn operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php500 in sales every day. She is requesting a Php14,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use this loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. Susan hopes that her business will expand even more. She dreams to give her children a good future and a good education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.
All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora is a proud mother of four. She is now 57 years old. Flora operates a store selling grocery items to the people in her village. She had been in her business for 10 years now. Aside from offering good products, she extend good costumer service to her customers. She aims for more profitable business and that is why she is asking for a loan of P25,000 to invest in buying more merchandise for sale in her store. She will buy sardines, eggs, bread, biscuits and softdrinks to sell. She hopes to keep gaining good sales in order to save a fund for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy sardines, eggs, bread, biscuits and softdrinks to sell

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en: Leonisa is 62 years old and lives in Navalan, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with six children. Leonisa has a store that sells canned goods, dry goods, etc. She has had this business for 6 years. She is requesting a loan to to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap and sugar. Leonisa has been a member of PMPC for almost six years. In the future, Leonisa hopes to expand her little store to become a bigger grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap and sugar .

location.town: Pagadian - Navalan, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, tiene 38 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos los cuales tiene estudiando, él es un agricultor sembrando granos básicos, tiene dos manzanas de terreno cultivadas de maíz, y desde hace 10 años lo realiza, esto lo aprendió de su padre.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, el cual aplicara a la milpa para fortalecer la plantación ya sembrada, esta compra le ayudara para realizar su trabajo y que su cultivo pueda ser provechoso.
La aspiración de Carlos es que su negocio con los granos básicos sea mejor, ya que de este alimenta a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 38 years old and married. He has two children who are in school. He is a farmer who grows basic grains. He has two plots of land planted with corn. He has done this work for 10 years, and he learned it from his father. 

He is requesting a loan to buy compost, which he will apply to the field to strengthen the crops that are already planted. This purchase will help him carry out his work, and his crop can provide a good harvest. 

Carlos's aspiration is to improve his business growing basic grains, since he feeds his family from it.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: Oscar Obdulio

texts.es:
Oscar, esta solicitando un préstamo, con el cual quiere invertir en la compra de medicamentos naturales para vender, se comprara vitaminas, jarabes, esencias, entre otros productos que son los necesarios para seguir vendiendo a los clientes.
Con el préstamo lograra mejorar su negocio, espera tener mas demanda de los clientes, para poder proveer a su esposa e hijos lo necesario para la subsistencia.
texts.en:
Oscar is requesting a loan to invest in natural medicines. He plans to buy vitamins, syrups and essences, among other necessary products to sell to his clients. 

Thanks to this loan, he expects to improve his business and to increase client demand, so that he'll be able to provide his wife and son with everything they might need.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, syrups and essences.

loans.name: Thaer

texts.en:
Thaer is from Iraq. He is 39 years old, married, and a father of three children. Thaer is the only provider of the family.

Thaer owns a small grocery store where he sells soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2008 and now he has an employee. He built a good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Thaer is requesting a USD 3,000 loan to buy a generator and to install a display window. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions and to open a bigger supermarket.

loans.use: to buy a generator and to install a display window in his store.

loans.name: Banaba Group

texts.en: Imelda is married with four children. Imelda is 43 years old and lives in Lenienza, Pagadian City. Imelda sells plasticwares and other kitchen utensils to earn for a living. She has had this business for 5 years. Each month, she earns Php18,000.00 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of Php8,000 to  purchase more stock of plasticware for her retail business. Imelda has been a member of PMPC for almost one year. In the future, Imelda hopes to have her own retail and wholesale store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of plasticware for her retail business

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
This is Margaret. She previously accessed an 17,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures. She is working hard to provide income for her everyday expenses. She would like to apply for another 18,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. Margaret hopes that her business will grow bigger. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 49 years old, married, and has four children. She has a grocery business in Emali, where she sells tomatoes, onions, and other fruits and vegetables. She has been in the business for three years, and it has been profitable.

This will be Patricia's fourth loan term, and she plans to use the amount to buy more stock of onions, tomatoes, and carrots to sell. Since they are in high demand, she anticipates making more profits, which she will use to build a permanent store for selling her grocery items.

Patricia hopes to expand her business by supplying some of her items, like tomatoes and onions, to hotels and restaurants. This will increase her income and allow her to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of onions, tomatoes, and carrots to sell.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is a single, youth client of 28 years of age, who lives with his parents.

Ali owns a small grocery store, selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2000. He built a good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Ali is requesting a USD 3,000 youth loan to pay the yearly rent of his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to buy a bigger grocery store.

loans.use: to pay the yearly rent of his shop.

loans.name: Maria Lolita

texts.en:
Maria Lolita is married, with four children. Maria Lolita is 40 years old and lives in Camul, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Maria Lolita owns a general store to earn a living and has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns PHP 15,000 doing this type of work. 

She has requested a loan to purchase more stock for her general store, such as shampoo, toothpaste, and other items. Maria Lolita has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for two years. In the future, Maria Lolita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store, such as shampoo, toothpaste, and other items.

loans.name: Federico

texts.en:
Federico is married with six children. He is 54 years old and lives in Farmington, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Federico is a farmer, and, for 15 years, he has earned a living from his rubber tree farm. He has requested a loan to purchase fertilizer.

Federico has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Federico hopes to expand his farm.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his rubber tree farm.

loans.name: Ziyaddin

texts.en:
For more than 21 years, Ziyaddin continues the family farming business. He is 55 years old, married and the father of four children. His children are aged 22 years, 25years, 26 years and 27 years old. He sells cattle and this is the only revenue that he earns for a living. His two sons assist the family budget with their salary. Ziyaddin would like to build a house and get his sons married. He dreams of a guaranteed future for all of his children.
Ziyaddin plans to buy feed for fattening his cattle. For this purpose, he needs a loan of AZN 1000.

loans.use: To buy feed for fattening cattle

loans.name: Estela Maria

texts.en:
Estela Maria is 42 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with six children. 

Estela Maria has a grocery store and sells groceries and other consumable products; she earns approximately 6,000 PHP each month. She has requested a loan to be used to purchase more stock for her store.

Estela Maria has been a member of PMPC for almost three years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy stock for her grocery store.

loans.name: Enhtsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Enhtsetseg is 49 years old and lives with her husband and son in a ger in the Amgalan district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband Dashdorj, age 54, helps his wife to run her organic fruit retail business. Her son works in Erlian, China as an assistant worker. She has been running her organic fruit sales business from a rental counter at the local market for eight years now. She has built close relationships with her suppliers and customers over the years. 

Mrs. Enhtsetseg is now requesting 1,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of organic fruits to sell during the lunar new year season. She is a hardworking and smart lady.

loans.use: to purchase organic fruits to sell.

loans.name: Rida

texts.en:
Rida is a 21-year-old Lebanese single man living with his parents and four siblings. Three of them are working. 

In 2011, he started running his own shop, selling toys, accessories, perfumes and souvenirs. His income is important to help his father with the household expenses. He also wishes to have his own family and children. 

This is the reason he’s asking today for a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to expand his store’s inventory of perfumes, accessories and toys. His intention at this stage is to augment his sales so as to amplify his income. In the future, he is planning to open other branches in the surrounding areas.

loans.use: to expand his store’s inventory of perfumes, accessories and toys.

loans.name: Fariha

texts.en:
Fariha is a 41-year-old Lebanese married woman. She’s living with her husband in their modest house located in one of the beautiful Lebanese villages. Cooperating together, Fariha and her husband have been able to satisfy their needs and live a good life. 

Fariha owns a small mini-market where she sells all kinds of dairy and daily products in addition to soft drinks and many other products. As for her husband, he has been working as a painter since 2010.  

Fariha realized that she needs a fair amount of money to improve her business. That’s why she’s asking today for a loan from Kiva Partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions for her mini-market. In that way, she will be able to diversify her items and therefore increase her revenues and improve her way of living. 

Fariha looks forward to expanding her grocery, waiting the perfect time to open other branches and assign people to work with her.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of food provisions for her mini-market.

loans.name: Sajad

texts.en:
Sajad is from Iraq. He is 26, single, and lives with his parents. Sajad is the only provider for his family.

Sajad owns a small garage and specializes in washing cars. He established his business in 2010, and now he has two employees. He has gained good experience in this field, and he is well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation.

Sajad is requesting a youth loan of 3,000 USD to renovate his garage and install a new floor. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to open a bigger garage.

loans.use: to renovate his garage and install a new floor.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 26-year-old man. He’s married to Zahra, a lovely wife and the mother of his only child. She is a great support to him, especially when he finds it hard to cover the usual family expenses. 

Hussein owns a cattle farm in his town where he raises cattle from which he obtains dairy products to sell. He has been involved in this domain for many years and knows very well how to manage his work in a good way. He’s really good in his domain and looks forward to developing his business as best he can. In parallel, he is an employee at the municipality. 

For this reason, he wants to take a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase additional cattle and a fair quantity of their food for the coming winter. Because of his good products, Hussein is thinking of opening a small shop where he could sell all kinds of dairy products.

loans.use: to purchase additional cattle in addition to a fair quantity of their food for the coming winter.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 45-year-old man. He is married and lives in Lebanon with his wife and three school-age children. 

Hussein is obliged to work continually as he wants to better enhance his family’s way of living. He has been working in the construction field since 1990. He specializes in floor cleaning and painting as well. He works on a freelance basis and has many projects to be accomplished.  

Regardless of being satisfied with what he has attained so far, he suffers from a bad financial situation. That’s the reason he’s asking today for a loan from Kiva Partner Vitas s.a.l. to improve his business by purchasing new tools as he plans to keep on offering the best quality of work ever. 

In the near future, he plans to take added loans to open his own paintings shop. This is how he works really hard to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to improve his business by purchasing new tools.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro, se dedica a la venta de artículos plásticos y de consumo, tiene 22 años de edad, está soltero, vive con su hermana quien tiene un hijo de dos años de edad,  él tiene cinco años de estar realizando el negocio, trabajando de lunes a sábado.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de artículos como bolsas plásticas de deferentes tamaños, tambien productos de cosumo para la tienda, esta mercadería le ayudara para incrementar el negocio y que sus ganancias sean mejor.
Él aspira fortalecer el negocio, ya que permitirá crecer y brindarse una mejor calidad de vida con su hermana.
texts.en:
Alejandro sells plastic goods and consumer products. He is 22 years old, single, and lives with his sister who has a two-year-old son.

Alejandro has been in business for five years and works Monday through Saturday. He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise, such as plastic bags of different sizes. Alejandro will also acquire consumer products for his store. This merchandise will help to increase his business and improve his earnings. Alejandro aspires to strengthen his business, which will allow him to grow and provide a better quality of life for his sister.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags of different sizes and other consumer products.

loans.name: Elsa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Elsa, tiene 65 años de edad, vive en casa propia con tres sobrinos, administra una panadería de la cual obtiene ingresos para sustentar las necesidades de su familia, este oficio lo aprendió de sus padres, heredo el negocio y tiene 10 años de ser propio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina, azúcar, levadura, entre otros materiales que sean necesarios, esto será un beneficio para Elsa, adquirir el dinero necesario para comprar a mejor precio y así mejorar la producción.
Su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio para tener más estabilidad económica, ya que esto le proporciona para su familia una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa, 65, lives in her own house with three nieces and nephews.  She runs a bakery from which she earns income to support her family's needs.  She learned this trade from her parents; she inherited the business and has owned it for 10 years.

She's requesting a loan to buy flour, sugar, leavening, and other necessary materials.  It will benefit Elsa to get the money she needs to buy at a better price and improve production.

Her goal is to strengthen her business to have more financial stability because this will give her better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and leavening

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 62 years old and lives in Corrales, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with five children. 

Erlinda runs a ready-to-wear clothing business and earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month. She has requested a loan for purchasing construction materials.

Erlinda has been a member of PMPC for almost ten years. In the future, Erlinda hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Milca

texts.en:
Milca is 55 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez,  Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children. 

Milca is engaged in a rice cake, or “puto,” baking business and earns approximately 1,500 PHP each month. She has requested a loan for purchasing additional rice, sugar, and other ingredients for her rice cake baking business. 

Milca has been a member of PMPC for almost five years. In the future, Milca hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance is a 45-year-old married woman living in the town of Masindi, Uganda.Twenty years ago she decided to set up a retail shop in order to meet the day-to-day expenses of her family. With the profits earned she has been able to pay school fees for her children and buy land for farming. She has also managed to set up rental houses where she earns a monthly rent from four tenants. Her greatest business challenges are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital, while her dream is to own a wholesale shop.

Constance intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise such as soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Felisa's Group

texts.en:
Felisa is 59 years old and lives in Poblacion, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married, with three children. 

Felisa has an eatery business and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional meat, rice, vegetables, and soft drinks for her existing business.

Felisa has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for almost 13 years. In the future, Felisa hopes to expand her business. 

Felisa is the leader of a two-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase additional meat, rice, vegetables, and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
Flora de 43 años casada con Juan de 50 años tiene 4 hijos a quienes dedica la totalidad de su trabajo. Posee una vivienda construida a base de material noble. Al iniciar su compromiso junto a Juan optó gracias a unos ahorros  y con el apoyo de sus padres aperturar una pequeña tienda a de abarrotes en aquel entonces su vivienda de madera.
Lleva casi 20 años con su actividad y desde entonces trabajo con el entusiasmo que la caracteriza para construir su vivienda a base de material noble adicionándole el préstamo que le otorgó su institución financiera.
Comenta que le agrada mucho ser propietaria de su actual negocio puesto que gracias a ello a logrado convertirse en una vecina querida y conocida logrando también brindarle una atención adecuada a sus hijos. No obstante el crédito en vivieres que otorga a algunos clientes le generan problemas a la hora de realizar su balance mensual debido al retrazo en el pago de los mismos.
A manera de surtir como es de costumbre su negocio desea contar con su entidad financiera para la compra de abarrotes al por mayor ya que de esta manera obtiene precios bajos y por consiguiente mejores ganancias.
Sus planes a futuro tienen por objetivo convertirse algún día en comerciante mayorista de abarrotes. En esta ocasión desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abarrotes al por mayor como arroz, azúcar, conservas enlatadas, entre otros.
texts.en:
Flora, 43, is married to Juan, 50.  She has four children to whom she devotes all her work.  She has a house built of solid materials.

At the beginning of her engagement to Juan, thanks to some savings and with the support of her parents, she decided to open a small grocery store in the wood house she lived in at the time.  She has had her job for almost 20 years.  Since then she has worked with her characteristic enthusiasm to build her house with solid materials, adding to it the loan from her financial institution.

She says she very much likes to be the owner of her current business because thanks to it she has managed to become a beloved and well-known neighbor as well as to give her children enough attention.  Nevertheless, the credit for provisions that she grants to some customers generates problems for her when it comes time to calculate her monthly balance, because of the delay in their payment.

As a means of stocking her business as usual, she wants to count on her financial institution to buy groceries wholesale.  This ways she gets low prices and, consequently, better profits.

Her plan for the future is to become a wholesale grocery merchant someday.

Currently she wants to have 2,000 nuevos soles [PEN] to buy groceries wholesale, such as rice, sugar, canned goods, and other items.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, canned goods, and other groceries wholesale

loans.name: Enrique Eduardo

texts.es:
Enrique, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y pollos, tiene 30 años de edad, está casado con su esposa tienen una hija de un año de edad, Enrique tiene la crianza de pollos de engorde y cerdos de engorde, con siete años de experiencia, trabaja todos los días en la  granja.
Él  solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y pollos pequeños para criarlos, tambien comprara concentrado esto le ayudara para mejorar la capacidad de la granja y tener a futuro nuevas posibilidades de ingresos.
La aspiración de él es fortalecer mas el negocio, ofrecer una mejor condición de vida a su familia a través de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Enrique raises pigs and chickens. He is 30, and he and his wife have a one-year-old daughter. Enrique fattens the pigs and chickens. This has been his profession for seven years, and he works on the farm every day. 

He is applying for a loan to buy piglets and young chickens to raise, to buy food concentrate to improve production, and to have a chance to increase income in the future. He aspires to make his business stronger and offer his family a better life through his labors.

loans.use: to buy piglets and young chickens to raise.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.es:
Aurora, de 37 años, es una mujer emprendedora. Convive con José, y  juntos tienen 06 hijos. Ellos habitan cómodamente en su casa propia.
Su trabajo consiste en atender su propio multiservicios que tiene en un local en el interior de su propia casa, negocio que está muy implementado, ahçi mismo brinda consejos sobre mecánica de vehículos. Por otro lado es costurera. Tiene más de 05 años realizando ambas actividades, en la primera su pareja la ayuda, pues se encarga de la reparación de los vehículos y en donde esta pendiente de tener las herramientas y repuestos necesarios para una buena atención a sus clientes. Mientras que en el segundo, realiza trabajos de confecciones de disfraces y de otras prendas, pues tiene ahora un contrato para realizar varios diseños. Ella espera mas adelante ampliar su taller de costura donde pueda confeccionar con mayor comodidad, así como su multiservicio,
Este es el préstamo numero 02 con la institución MFP, esta muy contenta de trabajar con su grupo ya que los considera buenos, además agradece el trabajar con la institución por que le dan mucha ayuda.
Con el monto solicitado de 2,500 soles, comprará productos y herramientas para su taller de costura, asimismo abatecer su multiservicios con desarmadores, martillos, alicates entre otros.
texts.en:
Aurora, 37, is an entrepreneurial woman. She lives with José; together they have 6 children. They live comfortably in their own house. Her work consists of running her own full-service business out of her own home. This business is already established. In addition, she offers automotive mechanical advice. On the other side, she is a seamstress.

She has more than 5 years of experience in both fields. In the first field, her husband helps; he is in charge of the vehicle repairs and the parts and tools needed for excellent service. In the second field, she produces costumes and other clothing. Now, she has a contract to produce a variety of designs.

She hopes that later on she can increase the size of her sewing workshop where she could do her work more comfortably, just like her full-service side of the business.

This is the second loan with MFP. She is happy to work with the group since she considers them good people. In addition, she thanks the work of the communal bank because they give her a lot of help.

With the amount she is requesting, 2,500 soles, she will buy products and tools for her sewing workshop, and stock her full-service business with screwdrivers, hammers, and pliers, among other things.

loans.use: she will buy products and tools for her sewing workshop, and stock her full-service business with screwdrivers, hammer, and pliers, among other things.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to place an order for a variety of music CDs and to buy cleaning fluid.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is widowed with two children. She is 57 years old and lives in Canubay, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

Milagros sells Avon products to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. She has requested a loan to purchase feed for her hog-fattening business.

Milagros has been a member of PMPC for 11 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and to have more savings for her necessities.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her hog-fattening business.

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 49 years old and lives in Map-an, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with eight children. 

Estela has a refreshment store that sells bread, kakanin, and drinks; she earns approximately 4,500 PHP each month. She has requested a loan for purchasing additional food and drinks for her existing business.

Estela has been a member of PMPC for almost eight years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy food and drinks for sale.

loans.name: Ana Heriberta

texts.es:
Ana, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada, tiene tres hijos, ella es comerciante de ropa y administra una tienda, este negocio está instalado en su casa de habitación, tiene 35 años de experiencia, aprendió con sus padres y lo realiza de lunes a sábado.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra productos de la canasta básica para la tienda, arroz, gaseosas, jugos,entre otros productos, tambien ropa en variedad de blusas, faldas, ropa interior, tambien comprara , esta compra contribuirá a que Ana pueda crecer en el negocio y seguir trabajado.
Para ella el objetivo con el préstamo es fortalecer el negocio y ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana is 60 years old, married, and has 3 children. She runs a store where she sells clothing. This business is located in her home. She has 35 years of experience. She learned from her parents and works Monday through Saturday.

She is requesting this loan to buy everyday items: rice, soda, juice, among other things. She will also buy a variety of clothing: blouses, skirts, and undergarments. 

This purchase will enable Ana to grow her business and continue working. The objective of this loan is to strengthen the business and give her children a better life.

loans.use: to buy rice, sodas, juices, blouses, skirts, and undergarments.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado de engorde, el tiene 41 años de edad, está casado, su esposa tiene 38 años de edad, tienen dos hijos los cuales están estudiando, desde joven se ha dedicado a la ganadería, lo aprendió con su padre, trabaja todos los días.
Él solicita un préstamo porque quiere comprarse ganado (una vaca), tambien aprovecha para adquirir una buena cantidad de concentrado para alimentar el hato ganadero, este crédito le ayudara a incrementar y tener lo necesario para mejorar su condición de ganadero.
La aspiración de Carlos es que su negocio crezca más, ayudándole a ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos raises livestock to sell. He is 41 and married. His wife is 38, and they have two children in school. He has been raising livestock since he was young. He learned the trade from his father, and he works at it every day. 

He is applying for a loan to buy a cow and to buy a large quantity of animal feed concentrate. The loan will help him increase his herd and improve its health. Carlos hopes to grow his business, which will help him give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy a cow and a large quantity of animal feed concentrate.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is from Iraq.  He is single, 26 years old, and lives with 3 family members.  He is the only provider of the family.  Ahmad owns a small shop and specializes in selling children’s clothing.  He established his business in 2009.  He gained experience in this field and is well known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Ahmad is requesting a $3,000 youth loan to pay the annual rent of his shop and to increase his inventory.  He is aiming to grow his business and to increase his profits so that he will be able open a big shop that specializes in children’s wear.

loans.use: to pay rent and to increase inventory.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, para poder fortalecer el negocio, dándole más mantenimiento, comprara repuestos para el mantenimiento de los molinos y gasolina para almacenar y encender el molino, considera que con este aporte estará mejorando su condición en el negocio.
Él tuvo un efecto positivo con el negocio, creo más clientela satisfecha con el servicio, y en su economía considera que ha mejorado.
texts.en: Rafael decided to apply for a new loan to makes his business stronger by doing repairs. He will buy replacement parts for the mills and gasoline for storage and to run the equipment. He expects this investment to strengthen his business. The previous loan was successful, as he has more satisfied customers, and his finances have improved.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for the mill and gasoline to keep it running.

loans.name: Baydae

texts.en:
Baydae is from Iraq. She is 31 years old, married and has two children. Baydae and her husband provide the family income.

Baydae is a tailor. She established her business in 2009. She has built good experience in this field and she is well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation.

Baydae is requesting a loan of $2,400 to buy a motor generator, an air conditioner and equipment specialized for tailoring. She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits so she will be able to provide her family better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator, an air conditioner and specialized equipment for tailoring

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 34-year-old married woman with two children living in Masindi, Uganda. She is a school bursar, and three years ago she decided to set up a retail shop in order to earn extra income. Like most traders, she faces challenges of price fluctuation and high license fees. 

Being the good mother that she is, she aims to educate her children, helping them attain degrees as minimum qualification so that they can be employed in reputable organizations. 

Sarah intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise such as cooking oil and salt to sell in her shop.

loans.use: to buy general merchandize such as cooking oil and salt to sell.

loans.name: Aurora De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
La señora aurora  vive en la cuidad de Managua, casada con dos pequeños hijos  menores en edad escolar, es una persona muy conocida en su barrio ya  que sus clientes estan  en  su vecindario.

La comercialización de sus productos los hace al crédito con pagos quincenales.

Esta solicitando un préstamo por que quiere hacer la inversión de útiles escolares ya que  con el  inicio del año escolar tiene bastantes encargos de sus clientes. 

El crédito será para la compra uniforme escolar, mochila,  cuadernos.
texts.en:
Aurora lives in Managua, is married, and has two children in elementary school. She is well known in her neighborhood, and most of her customers are neighbors. She offers her customers credit terms of two weeks.

She is applying for a loan to buy school supplies, since she has many customer orders for the new school year. She will use the loan to buy uniforms, backpacks, and notebooks.

loans.use: to buy school merchandise like uniforms, backpacks, and notebooks.

loans.name: Erdenechimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Erdenechimeg is a 31-year-old female living in the Chingeltei district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.  She lives with her parents and 2 children in the same house.  Her parents are retired and stay at home.  Her daughters, Altan (15) and Enhjin (4), attend secondary school and kindergarten, respectively.  Mrs. Erdenechimeg has been running a small grocery store on her land since 2012.  Her mother also works at the store while she is away purchasing inventory.  

She is now requesting 4,000,000 MNT to purchase a heating system for her home in order to reduce the consumption of coal and firewood.  She is a hardworking, enthusiastic woman who says, "Installing electric heating system and reducing smoke of Ulaanbaatar will be my contribution to make my home city less polluted".

loans.use: to purchase a heating system for her home.

loans.name: Mtazamo Group

texts.en:
Haidary, who is in his early 30's, is married with two children. One of his children goes to school, and the other child is still small. He has been selling telephone accessories and performing telephone repairs for five years now. He works from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Haidary's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to buy a wider selection of inventory for his telephone shop, to open a salon for men, and to cover household expenses. He has paid back all his loans successfully.  He will use this loan to increase stock on telephone accessories to resell.  He dreams of going to China and of buying his shop accessories.

He will share this loan with his loan group Mtazamo, which has 15 members.  The members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase stock of telephone accessories to resell.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
Guadalupe, se dedica a la venta de zapatos, vive con un hermano de 60 años, vive en casa propia, él tiene la habilidad de panificador elaborando pan, tambien realiza la venta de zapatos, este es su trabajo actual, lo hace desde hace 11 años.
Él necesita un aporte para fortalecer el negocio, comprando zapatos variados para niños y para adultos, su idea es mejorar su condición en el negocio, ayudándole con este crédito para que siga ofreciendo variedad a los clientes, porque le permite tener más ganancia.
En sus planes esta construir un muro que rodee su vivienda, para tener más seguridad.
texts.en:
Guadalupe earns his living selling shoes. He lives in his own house with his 60 year-old brother. He is a capable baker, and he also sells shoes. This is his current job. He started 11 years ago. 

He needs a loan to strengthen his business by buying a variety of shoes for children and adults. His idea is to improve his status with the business. It will give him the money to continue offering a variety to his customers because they give him his earnings. His plans are to construct a wall that surrounds his home to increase security.

loans.use: to buy shoes for children and adults.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 36 years old and lives in San Roque, Panaon, Misamis Occidental.  She is married with 3 children. Fe is involved in hog fattening and earns approximately 2,000 each month with this activity.  She has requested a loan to purchase sacks of feeds.

Fe has been a member of PMPC for almost 7 years.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase hog feed.

loans.name: Tuya

texts.en:
Tuya is 44 years old. She lives with her husband and daughter in a ger in the Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. Her husband Shagdarsuren, age 41, works at a private hospital in town. Her daughter Nandin-Erdene, age 19, is a university student. 

Tuya has started her own business of a small retail operation in the local market in 1991. She opened her organic dairy products sales and meat sales business at the local market in 1995. She has built a regular customer base over the years. She is now requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products from herders in order to sell to local customers. She is a hardworking and diligent woman.

loans.use: to purchase large amount of organic dairy products from herders to sell to local customers

loans.name: Abdul Kareem

texts.en:
Abdul Kareem is from Iraq. He is 47 years old, married, and has three children. Abdul Kareem is the only provider of the family.

Abdul Kareem owns a small grocery store, selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2010. He built a good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Abdul Kareem is requesting a USD 1,200 loan to pay the yearly rent of his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to pay the yearly rent of his shop.

loans.name: Rozi

texts.en: Rozi is a 45-year-old married woman with ten children living in Kasese, Uganda. For fourteen years now she has been selling clothes. She got her initial capital from farming, which she still practices. With the proceeds, she has been able to pay school fees for her children. So far, two of them have graduated. Rozi intends to use the loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Martha Isabel

texts.es:
Martha Isabel es una joven de 27 años originaria de la comarca La Palma ubicada a 7 km del municipio de El Sauce.
A pesar de ser criada en el campo tiene la visión de salir adelante y ser una profesional por eso optó por estudiar la carrera de Magisterio porque le apasiona enseñar a leer y escribir a los niños sobre todo los del campo que son humildes y sencillos y que necesitan mucho del apoyo de los demás.

Es una mujer luchadora que trata de enfrentar todas las adversidades que en la vida se le presentan como tener que dar clases en una comarca muy alejada de la zona donde habita y todos los días se levanta a las 4 de la mañana para estar puntual en la escuelita.

A su corta edad tiene un hogar conformado por su esposo y su pequeño hijo los que en conjunto luchan a diario para tener un hogar digno donde vivir.

Actualmente tiene dos años de desempeñarse como profesora de primaria y está solicitando por primera vez un crédito para compra de medicina y pago de exámenes médicos con el fin de mejorar su salud, ya que últimamente se ha sentido mal y por su bajo salario no puede cubrir estos gastos.

Solicita el apoyo a los inversionistas de KIVA a través de Ceprodel para que le otorguen este pequeño crédito ya que sin la ayuda de ellos no pueden cubrirse estos importantes gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Martha Isabel is 27 and was born in La Palma district, which is 7 km from the city of El Sauce. Despite being raised on a farm, she has a vision to get ahead by following a profession. She is studying to be an elementary teacher because she is passionate about teaching children, especially those modest children who live in the countryside and need more support, to read and write. She is a fighter, who tries to face all the difficulties life presents, such as holding classes in an area far from her house. Every day she gets up at 4 a.m. to get to the little school on time.

At her young age, she has a family comprised of her husband and young son, for whom they work together to provide a decent home. She has been an elementary teacher for two years. She is applying for a loan to buy medicine and pay for medical exams so that her health will improve. Recently, she has been ill and unable to pay these expenses. She is asking that Kiva lenders, through Ceprodel, grant her this small loan, since she will not be able to cover these important household expenses without their help.

loans.use: to buy medicine and pay for medical exams.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 40-year-old married woman and a mother of three children ages 16, 14 and 12. Jocelyn is engaged in a fish-vending business. She has been in the business for more than 15 years now. Her husband works as a fisherman. 

Jocelyn is asking for a loan to buy additional fish to sell in the market. In the future, Jocelyn hopes of making her business a success. Moreover, she wants to continue to support the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell in the market

loans.name: Damaris

texts.es: Damaris tiene  27  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y una hija actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar  materiales como arena, sementó, clavos entre otros. Ella piensa realizar un arreglo a la cocina de la casa para tener  mejor aseo y mayor comodidad, ya que la casa es bastante pequeña y no hay recursos para hacerla más grande, por lo que ella solicito un crédito, y es el segundo  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Damaris is 27, married, and lives with her husband and young daughter. She will use the loan to buy building materials like sand, cement, nails, and other items. She plans to remodel her kitchen so that is it more accessible and comfortable. It is quite small, and she lacks the money to expand it. She is applying for a loan, which will be the second one she has received from FUDECOSUR. She had no prior government loans, but FUDECOSUR has offered her good terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to remodel her kitchen.

loans.name: Frieda

texts.es:
Frieda, de 34 años es una mujer emprendedora y con ganas de superarse, convive con Walter quien es comerciante.  Ellos habitan en su casa en compañía de su tres hijos. El trabajo de Frieda consiste en la venta de cosméticos, pues sale de casa en casa a recoger algun pedido que por medio de catalogo sus clientes selecciona el producto; asimismo ofrece prendas de vestir y joyas. También cuenta con un pequeño local en el interior de su vivienda donde coloca todos los productos y los exhibe, recibiendo a su clientela. Su hija mayor la ayuda en la venta. Tiene más de 03 años trabajando en esto y le va muy bien.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que aporta en la economía de su hogary también porqué maneja su tiempo.
