Espera en el futuro instalar un local mas amplio y surtirla de productos novedosos, para poder exhibirlos con mayor comodidad y brindar una atención excelente. Este es el segundo préstamo con la institución MFP, le grada mucho el grupo que conforma, además espera poder cumplir como lo ha hecho hasta ahora, tiene muchas expectativas para mas adelante y espera mantener su historial crediticio con la institución impecable para que pueda seguir trabajando como lo ha hecho hasta ahora.
Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará productos por catalogo que están en promoción tales como perfumes, talcos, joyas para tenerlos en stock y poder maximizar su ganancia.
texts.en: Frieda, who is 34, is an enterprising woman with a strong desire to succeed.  She lives with Walter, who is a tradesman, and their 3 children.  Frieda sells cosmetics which means going from house to house to take orders from her customers who select products from a catalogue.  She also sells clothing and jewellery.  She also has a small corner of her home where she stores and displays her goods and into which she serves her customers, assisted by her eldest daughter.  Frieda has been running the business for 3 years and things are going well for her.  What she likes about her job is that it contributes to her household income and also because it enables her to manage her time.  In the future she hopes to extend her business premises and have a stock of new products which she will be able to display them more easily and offer excellent service to her customers.  This is her second loan with the MFP institution; she is very happy with the group and additionally hopes to be able to comply as she has until now.  She has many expectations for the future and hopes to maintain her impeccable credit history with the institution so that she can continue working as she has until now.  She will use the requested 2500 soles to buy mail order goods which are on special offer, such as perfume, talcum powder and jewellery, to build up a stock of goods and maximise her profits.

loans.use: to buy perfume, talcum powder and jewellery to build up a stock of goods and maximise her profits.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 45 years old and is from Ndunyu Njeru. She is married with two children who are between the ages of 12 and 20 years old.

Mary has a farming business that she has been operating for the past 12 years. She has applied for her second loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy farm inputs and fertilizers to use on her farm.

Mary hopes to expand her farming business in the near future and improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs and fertilizers

loans.name: Hos-Erdene

texts.en:
Hos-Erdene is 19 years old and lives with her parents and three younger siblings in a ger in the Amgalan district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her father Davaadeleg runs a transportation service with his truck. Her mother helps her to run her organic dairy products sales business from a rental counter at the  local market. Her siblings go to local schools. 

She started her organic dairy products sales business in the local market in September 2012. She is now requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase organic dairy products to sell at her rental counter in the local market. She is a hardworking, communicative and friendly woman.

loans.use: to purchase organic dairy products to sell in the local market

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 34-year-old married man living in Masindi, Uganda. The responsibility of looking after his four children rests solely on him, and his desire is to educate them up to university. 

Charles is a farmer and also sells maize for a living, despite the challenges of price fluctuations and inadequate capital. His business plan is to diversify his business and trade in other cereals and to venture into modern farming methods. Charles intends to use the loan to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize to sell.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is a youth client of 21 years of age, who is single and lives with four family members, two of whom are employed.

Ali is a carpenter. After gaining his experience from a former, well-known carpenter in the market, he established his own business in 2010 and now he has an employee. He built a good experience in this field and he is well-known in the surrounding area, with an excellent reputation.

Ali is requesting a USD 2,000 youth loan to buy a machine, specialized for his job. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide himself a good career path.

loans.use: to buy a machine, specialized for his job.

loans.name: Faeza

texts.en:
Faeza is from Iraq. She is 41 years old, married, and has three children. Both Faeza and her husband provide the family income.

Faeza is a midwife. In 1990, after facing difficulties in giving birth to her child, Faeza decided to help others to avoid difficulties while giving birth. She took some courses at a hospital in this field, and chose to make this her career. She has good experience in this field and is well known in the surrounding area by her excellent reputation.

Faeza is requesting a loan of 2,400 USD to buy a motor generator, to renovate her workplace, and to install a new floor. She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits so she’ll be able to open a modern workplace.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator, to renovate her workplace, and to install a new floor

loans.name: Toch

texts.en:
Toch is 40 years old.  She is married and resides with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia.  She has been making and selling boxes made of palm leaves for more than four years, earning approximately $3 a day.  Her husband is a carpenter who makes various items to sell (wardrobes, beds, chairs, tables, etc).  He earns about $4 per day.  One of Toch’s children is employed in a phone shop.  

Toch requests a loan of $500 to purchase a generator for her husband’s business.  This purchase will help her husband to work faster.  In the future, she would like to expand the business and build a new house if possible.

loans.use: to purchase a generator for her husband's carpentry work.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en:
Abel is 55 years old and from Olkalou. He is married to Elizabeth, and they have six children who are all in school.

Abel has a butchery and hotel business that he has been running for the past eight years. He has applied for his fourth loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy food ingredients for his hotel, such as baking flour, eggs, sugar, etc. He hopes to improve his living standards and to be able to educate his children.

loans.use: To buy cooking ingredients

loans.name: Cristopher Ricardo

texts.es:
El joven Cristopher Ricardo vive en la cuidad de Managua  soltero con muchos deseo de superación ya que en su proyecto esta seguir creciendo en su negocio de serigrafía,empezando a trabajar desde las 8am y cierra 6.pm.

se siente entusiasmado por que el poco tiempo que tiene de haber iniciado  su negocio ha venido creciendo eso lo motiva a seguir trabajado cada día mas por que  considera que su esfuerzo ha dado buenos frutos.

Cristopher solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como camiseta, desmanchadora, hule, madera, pintura ya que han aumentado su clientela.
texts.en:
Young Cristopher Ricardo lives in the city of Managua. He is unmarried and has a strong drive for improvement, now that in his project, his screenprinting business is continuing to grow. He starts to work at 8 a.m. and closes at 6 p.m. 

He feels excited because his business has been growing during the short time since he started it. This motivates him to continue working everyday, because he considers that his effort has borne excellent fruit.

Cristopher requests a loan to buy materials such as t-shirts, stain remover, rubber, wood, and paint since his clientele  has already increased.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, spatulas, stain remover, rubber, etc.

loans.name: Boushra

texts.en:
Boushra is from Iraq. She is 44 years old, married, and has three children. Boushra and her husband provide the family income.

Boushra is a tailor. She has been in this field since her childhood, but chose tailoring as her career path in 2003. She has good experience in this field and is well known in the surrounding area by her excellent reputation.

Boushra is requesting a loan of 2,100 USD to buy two new tailoring machines. She is aiming to grow her business and increase her profits so she will be able to provide her children with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy two new tailoring machines

loans.name: Sean

texts.en: Sean is 47 years old. She is widowed and resides with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than ten years, earning approximately 8 USD daily. Her children are tailors who make an income of 11 USD per day. Due to her family’s transportation difficulties, Sean requests a loan of 1,000 USD to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her reduce her family's transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her children's tailoring shop and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a 48-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been trading in maize for over ten years, and with the proceeds he has been able to educate his children and buy land. High license fees and price fluctuations hinder his business, while his desire is to own a food store dealing in a range of foods.

Wilson is requesting a loan to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize to sell.

loans.name: Mario Ezequiel

texts.es:
Mario Ezequiel es originario del municipio de Achuapa, un pueblito donde abunda la leche pura y que de ella se producen varios productos como la sabrosa rosquilla, el queso, la cuajada y la crema los cuales son comercializados fuera por la pureza de los mismos.

Tal es el caso de don Mario un señor de 57 años, casado, que tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la venta de lácteos, donde su tarea principal es adquirir la leche de las diferentes comarcas aledañas al municipio el cual es el insumo principal para procesarla y elaborar crema, cuajada y queso los cuales los traslada hacia la ciudad de Estelí para abastecer varios negocios.

Debido a la escasez de estos alimentos por la temporada de verano hay mayor demanda de sus clientes por lo que está solicitando un crédito para compra de leche en mayor cantidad y así elaborar más productos con el fin de satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.

Confía en Dios que los inversionistas de KIVA y Ceprodel le brinden su mano amiga y le otorguen este financiamiento para poder llevar a cabo su inversión y así hacer feliz a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mario is a native of the Achuapa municipality, a small community where pure milk is abundant, and along with it, its various products such as tasty donuts, cheese, curds, and cream, which are sold due to their same purity.

Such is the case of Mario, a 57-year old married man who has been selling dairy products for 20 years. His main work is acquiring milk from the different neighboring rural areas of the municipality, which is the main ingredient for the processing and making of cream, curds, and cheese. He transports these to the city of Estelí to supply various businesses. 

Due to the scarcity of these foods during the summer, there is a greater customer demand; for this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy milk in large quantities, and so be able to make his products with the intention of satisfying customer demand. 

He trusts in God that the lenders from Kiva and CEPRODEL will offer him their helping hand and grant him this loan to be able to carry out his investment, and so to please his customers.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Rasoul

texts.en:
Rasoul is from Iraq. He is a youth client who is 25 years old, married and a father of a single child. Rasoul is the only provider of the family.

Rasoul owns a big generator and provides his neighborhood with electricity. He established his business in 2006, and now he has an employee. He has built good experience in this field, and he is well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation.

Rasoul is requesting a youth loan of $2,400 to buy some spare parts for his generator. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his generator

loans.name: Angelica Johanna

texts.es:
Angélica de 32 anos de edad, soltera, del departamento de Managua, lugar que está ubicado en la zona central de la región. En sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música, y pasar tiempo con su familia. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudo terminar una carrera universitaria por falta de recursos económicos, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar periodismo y comunicación.
Gracias a su espíritu y capacidad de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica la venta de mercadería en general , la cual cosiste en vender ropa, pantalones, short, camisas, camisetas, perfumes, ropa interior, camisolas. Tiene tres anos en el negocio lo cual lo desempeña de forma ambulante. La rutina de Angélica es trabajar unas 10 horas diaria ofreciendo su mercadería con un bulto de unos 15 kg, recorriendo los diferentes lugares de su comunidad, donde clientes fijos y eventuales. Actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de mercadería y en un futuro no muy lejano obtener mejores ingresos. Angélica agradece l ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Angélica, 32, is single and from the department of Managua, located in the center of the country. In her free time, she likes to listen to music and spend time with her family. She was unable to attend college for lack of money, but she would have liked to study journalism and communication. Her spirit and desire to get ahead led her to her business selling general merchandise: clothing, pants, shorts, shirts, t shirts, perfumes, underwear, and camisoles.

She has been in business as a street vendor for three years. Angélica works 10 hours daily, happily carrying her 15 kg bag of merchandise to different local areas where she has regular and prospective customers. She will use this loan as working capital to restock her business by buying merchandise so that her income increases. Angélica thanks the Kiva lenders, whose support gives low-income people who live in poor countries like Nicaragua the chance to pursue decent work.

loans.use: to restock her business with merchandise such as clothing, pants, shorts, shirts, t shirts, perfumes, underwear, and camisoles.

loans.name: Hadi

texts.en:
Hadi is from Iraq.  He is 66 years old and married with two children.  Hadi is the only provider of the family.

Hadi owns a small shop and specializes in selling household electronics.  He established his business in 1990.  He gained experience in this field and is well known in the surrounding area with an excellent reputation.  Hadi is requesting a sum of $3,000 to renovate his shop.  He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he will be able to provide his children a good education.

loans.use: to renovate his electronics shop.

loans.name: Joselito

texts.en:
Joselito is a 29-year-old fisherman from Ubay, Bohol. He has been in the fishing business for more than two years now. This is the source of his income. 

Joselito is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights and fish hooks. With this, he will be able to improve his catch thus giving him more fish to sell in the market. Joselito wants to augment his income so that he can provide for the needs of the family and repay his loan on time.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights and fish hooks

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is a 45-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. For six years he has been operating a retail shop and the business has been very lucrative. He also deals in local brews, coffee and bananas for additional income. Godfrey is requesting money to buy soap, salt and sugar to sell in his retail shop.

loans.use: to buy soap, salt and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Chimedtseren

texts.en: Mr. Chimedtseren is 26 years old. He lives with his wife and daughter in a ger in Bayanhoshuu district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. His wife Altantsetseg, age 26, works at a local company. His daughter Dorjhand, age 4, goes to kindergarten. Mr. Chimedtseren has been working as a cobbler at a local company for years. He has just started his own business, providing cobbling services from his home. He is requesting 1,500,000 MNT to purchase starting inventory and equipment for his new business. He is hardworking, modest, and well-experienced.

loans.use: to purchase starting inventory and equipment for new cobbling business

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en:
Winfred, a 52-year-old widow, has a cereal selling business which she has operated for the past three years in Tala town. It has been profitable, enabling her to pay school fees for her 13 year old child as well as provide basic needs like food and shelter.

This will be Winfred's first loan, and she plans to use the amount to buy more stock of maize, beans, rice, and sorghum to sell. Since cereals are in high demand in her area, she anticipates generating more profits, which she will use to pay school fees for her child.

Winfred hopes to grow her business by opening another cereals shop. This will increase her income and enable her to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more stock of maize, beans, rice, and sorghum.

loans.name: Moa

texts.en:
Moa is 60 years old. She is married, with three children, and lives with some of her three children in the neighborhood of Reussey Keo district, which is a part of Phnom Penh. Moa’s husband passed away a few years ago and shifted responsibilities onto her. 

Moa owns and operates a farming business where she particularly grows rice. She also sews pieces of clothes for extra income from her home, generating approximately USD 2.50 per day. One of her daughters does the same sewing business as Moa. She has been working in sewing for more than two years. 

With the money from the loan Moa is requesting, she will be able to buy water pumps for carrying water into her crop fields since she experienced inadequate water in the past. She hopes to have a plentiful harvest, which can supply her family for a whole year.

loans.use: to buy water pumps for carrying water into her crop fields.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 58-yearold married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. For five years he has been selling fish. He also has a transportation business. 

Stringent rules on fishing and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock pose a challenge to his business growth, while his desire is to buy refrigerators and trade in wholesale. John intends to use the loan to buy fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her son's university tuition and cover his living expenses.

loans.name: Elieth De Los Angeles

texts.es: La joven Elieth es Lic. En contabilidad trabajo en el que se desempeña en una empresa privada, tiene una niña de 8 meses de nacida, es madre soltera que busca como salir adelante y vivir en mejores condiciones con su familia. Solicita el crédito para terminar de mejorar su cuarto que todavía le falta forrar las paredes de gypsum por lo que necesita comprar el material mencionado así como también tornillos, pasta para el pegado y pondrá el sistema eléctrico, ella está muy contenta y agradecida porque gracias a la facilidad de financiamiento irá haciendo estos cambios  en su vivienda.
texts.en:
The young woman Elieth is licensed in accounting and works at a private company.  She has an 8-month-old daughter and is a single mother looking to move forward and live in better conditions with her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to finish the improvements on her room; she still wants to line the walls with plaster, which is why she needs to buy the mentioned materials.  She also needs screws and paste for gluing.  She will also install an electric system.  

She is very happy and thankful because thanks to the easiness of this financing, she will be able to make these changes to her home.

loans.use: to buy plaster, screws, paste, and materials to install an electric system.

loans.name: Ana Eloisa

texts.es:
Ana, tiene 22 años de edad, está soltera, tiene un hijo de seis meses de edad, vive con su madre que tiene 48 años de edad, ella tiene dos años de estar en el negocio de la venta de frutas y verduras, lo aprendió de su madre, trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Ella necesita realizar fortalecimiento al negocio, comprando más frutas y verduras frescas, para esto solicita un préstamo en la que compre  manzanas, piña, papaya, papas, güisquiles, ejotes, entre otra variedad que existe para ofrecer, esta compra le permitirá incrementar el negocio.
La aspiración de Ana es que su negocio cuente con lo necesario para ofrecer a la clientela, ya que esto le dará más satisfacción y tendrá mayor seguridad en sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana, 22 years old, is single, and has one child who is 6 months old. She lives with her mother who is 48 years old. She has had her business selling fruits and vegetables for two years. She learned it from her mother, and works Monday to Saturday.

She needs to strengthen her business by buying more fresh fruits and vegetables. For this she requests a loan to buy apples, pineapple, papaya, potatoes, squash, and string beans, among other varieties which she might sell. This purchase will permit her to grow her business.

Ana's aspiration is for her business to have all the necessary products to offer to her clientele, as this will give her more satisfaction and she will have more security in her income.

loans.use: to buy apples, pineapple, papaya, potatoes, squash, string beans, etc.

loans.name: Ganchimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Ganchimeg, 38 years old, is the female head of the family. She lives with her mother and daughter in a ger (a traditional Mongolian yurt) in Bulgan province, Mongolia. Her daughter Erdenehishig, age 17, goes to the local secondary school. Ganchimeg's mother is retired and stays home.

Ganchimeg used to work as a teacher at a local school and she is now starting her own business, a bookstore in the local market. Her siblings run small bookstores in other cities so they share experience and ways to improve the business with her. Ganchimeg is requesting a loan of 680,000 MNT to purchase book inventory for her new business. She is a hardworking, optimistic and enthusiastic woman.

loans.use: to purchase inventory for her new business

loans.name: Josephat

texts.en: Josephat, 36 years old, is from Nakuru. He is married and has two children, 7 and 13 years old. Josephat has operated a transport business for the past three years. He has applied for his second loan from KADET LTD to enable him to service his motorcycle. Josephat hopes to buy a plot of land and to build rental houses in the near future.

loans.use: To service his motorcycle

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 31-year-old Mohamed from the Waterloo eastern area in Freetown. He is married and has 3 children between the ages of 1 and 12 years. Mohamed decided to start a business because he lost his father at an early age.

Mohamed runs a bar and restaurant, where he sells assorted drinks, pure water and snacks. He has been running this business for 10 years, working 11 hours per day and 7 days per week. Mohamed's business is his only source of income. He says that his main business challenges are insufficient capital and transportation.

Mohamed has requested a loan in order to buy more cartons of beer and stout, bags of rice and cooking oil.  The extra income from this loan will allow him to improve his capital and to increase his status. In the future, Mohamed plans to open another outlet. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy more beer, stout, rice and cooking oil.

loans.name: Bessing

texts.en:
Bessing is 26 years old and lives in Gardnersville, Liberia with her boyfriend. Bessing has been selling artificial hair for three years now, and she learned this business from her mother.

Bessing is requesting a loan to buy more artificial hair. Her plan is to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more artificial hair for her business.

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo para preparar el terreno donde cultiva, se comprara insumos agrícolas, comenzara a trabajar con mozos en la limpieza del terreno, este aporte será utilizado en la compra de semilla, abono, herbicidas, pago de mano de obra.
El efecto que ha tenido con el trabajo en los créditos es positivo, a pesar de la perdida que ocasiono el invierno en su cultivo, logro sacar parte de la cosecha, con esto se ha mantenido su familia y han podido seguir hacia adelante.
texts.en:
Jose decided to request a new loan to prepare his farmland for cultivation. He will buy agricultural supplies, and begin working with farmhands to clear the land. This contribution will be used to buy seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides, and to pay for labor.

Previous loans have had a positive impact on Jose's business. In spite of the loss that the winter incurred on his crops, he succeeded in getting part of his harvest. With this he has supported his family and he has been able to continue getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and herbicides, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Florence Group

texts.en:
They are six ladies, some married, some single, and they trade in different items such as ready-made dresses, oranges, sewing accessories, fish and second-hand clothing. They have been together for four years and meet on Wednesdays to discuss business.

Florence is a fifth loan borrower who sells ready-made dresses, with six years of working experience. Florence needs a loan of 800 GHS to be able to buy more dresses from the market at wholesale prices and to sell retail to her customers.

Florence is 32 years old, as is her husband. They have two children together.
She has been making enough profit from the previous loans and her expectation is to own the biggest retail shop in Teshie.

Florence's group needs a total amount of 3250 GHS to enable them to expand their businesses.

loans.use: To buy more ready-made dresses and sell to customers

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane grows bitter gourd, eggplant, string beans and green peppers on her one hectare vegetable farm. She is thankful because her spouse is a supportive and hard-working man. She and her spouse are blessed with four children. The eldest is working already while their other three children are still studying.

Mary Jane would like to improve the growth of her vegetables using farming supplies such as fertilizer, pesticides and wire.  Due to shortage of capital, Mary Jane is seeking for a loan of PHP 12,000. She knows that through proper care of her plants and sustaining them with appropriate farm supplies, she could gain better yields and profits this next harvest season. Then she could let her children finish their studies and be able to have a better way of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and wire for her vegetable farm.

loans.name: Asiimwe

texts.en: Asiimwe is a 35-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. Thirteen years ago he decided to venture into a retail shop business and with the profits he has been able to pay school fees for his children. He also trades in coffee to earn extra income despite challenges of inadequate capital and high cost of living. Asiimwe intends to use the loan to buy cassava flour, maize flour, rice and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour, maize flour, rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 24 years old, from Nakuru and is married with two children, ages 2 years and 3 months.

Francis has a transportation business that he has been running for the past four years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him buy a new motorbike.

Francis hopes to buy a piece of land in the near future.

loans.use: To buy a new motorbike

loans.name: Zaituni

texts.en: Zaituni is a 32-year-old single mother of two children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling clothes for six years and also earns a salary. The proceeds from her work have enabled Zaituni to educate her children and to build rental houses, which provide her with some income every month. Zaituni's major hardships are unpredictable customer preferences and inadequate capital. Her dream is to have a modern boutique dealing in all accessories. Zaituni intends to use this loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase starting inventory for his new business

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine is a 28-year-old married woman with two children living in Kasese, Uganda. For four years, she has been trading in cassava flour. She started her business in order to support her husband, whose wages could not fully meet the family's needs. 

Weather changes and inadequate capital pose challenges to Justine's business. Her goals are to educate her children, as well as diversifying her business to include maize and groundnut sales. Justine intends to use the loan to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell.

loans.name: Heriberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Heriberto, por la necesidad de comprar material y herramientas para trabajar, solicita un nuevo préstamo, que le permita comprarse zarandas, cucharas, almádana, carreta, y otros que son necesarios para que él continúe en su trabajo.
Él considera que los préstamos le han ayudado a tener los materiales necesarios y las herramientas para poder trabajar, sus condiciones de vida han mejorado.
texts.en:
Heriberto, owing to his need to buy materials and tools to work, is requesting a new loan, which will permit him to buy sieves, spoons, a sledgehammer, wagon, and other necessities so that he can continue in his job.

He considers that past loans have helped him obtain the necessary materials and tools that enable him to work, and therefore his quality of life has improved.

loans.use: to buy sieves, spoons, a sledgehammer, wagon

loans.name: Dashdulam

texts.en:
Dashdulam is 38 years old. She lives with her husband and daughter in a small house in the Zuun ail district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband, Nasan, age 38, works as a driver in a local private company. Her daughter, Enhjin, age 14, goes to a local secondary school. 

Dashdulam has been working as a saleswoman in construction retail. She has gained a lot of experience in the construction supplies sales business. 

She is now requesting MNT 3,000,000 to start her own construction supplies retail business at a rental counter of a local market. She is a hard-working and communicative woman.

loans.use: to start her own construction supplies retail business at a rental counter of a local market.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and blocks to construct a bathroom.

loans.name: Jenneh

texts.en: Jenneh is 38 years old and lives in Montrserrado County, which is the highest fish-production area of the Liberian market. She is married with two children ages 3 and 10, and both attend school and live at home. For three years now she has been selling rice, pepper, bitter ball, vita, etc. in her community market. She started this business with money given to her by her mother and learned this trade from her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, pepper, bitter ball, vita, etc. for her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, bitter ball, vita, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Blanca Del Carmen

texts.es:
En el bello municipio de El Sauce habita la joven Blanca del Carmen, soltera, de 26 años que estudió la carrera de Administración de Empresas, criada con buenos principios y costumbres y que optó por buscar empleo desde muy joven para pagar sus estudios ya que sus padres son de escasos recursos.

Como una joven emprendedora y con visión de salir adelante inició laborando como oficinista hoy desempeña el cargo de auxiliar de contabilidad y terminó su carrera profesional.

Está solicitando un crédito para pagar los módulos para obtener el título de Licenciada en Administración de Empresas, ya que con su bajo salario solo abastece sus gastos personales y del hogar porque es responsable de la vivienda donde habita con sus padres.
texts.en:
The young woman Blanca del Carmen lives in the beautiful town of El Sauce.  She is single, and is twenty-six years old.  She studies Business Administration and was raised with good principles and traditions.  She opted to look for work since she was very young in order to pay for her studies, since her parents come from a background of scarce resources.

As a young enterprising woman with a vision to move forward, she began to work in an office.  Today, she works as an accounting assistant and she has finished her professional career classes.

She is requesting a loan to pay the final fees in order to get her License in Business Administration degree.  With her low salary, she can only cover her personal and home expenses; she is responsible for the home where she lives with her parents.

loans.use: to pay the final fees for her university degree.

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en:
Mabinty is 34 years old and married with two children, ages 6 years and 18 years old.  She runs a general merchandise store in Waterloo, eastern area in Freetown. She has two additional relatives that live with her at home. 

She's been in this business for five years and sells bagged rice, bagged flour, Maggi and cooking oil. She describes her major problems as insufficient capital and cost of transportation from Freetown to Waterloo. 

She requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more cooking items like bagged rice, bagged flour, Maggi and cooking oil. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her educate her children and expand her business. In the future, she would like to build a house. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more cooking items like bagged rice, bagged flour, Maggi and cooking oil

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 32-year-old Memunatu from Waterloo, in the eastern area in Freetown. She is married and has two children, 2 and 10 years old, one of whom attends school. 

For the past 10 years, Memunatu has run a business selling chicken, working 12 hours per day and 7 days per week.  The business is Memunatu's sole source of income. She says that her main business challenges are the poor electricity supply and transportation problems.

Memunatu has requested a loan in order to buy more cartons of chicken for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and to increase her business. In the future, Memunatu hopes to open a poultry industry. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more cartons of chicken for resale

loans.name: Chi

texts.en:
Chi, a 41-year-old married woman, lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She has one son. Chi and her husband run a business, selling a variety of basic goods to people in the local community.

Chi has requested a loan to purchase more products, such as food, soaps, washing powder and shampoos, to stock her store. This will enable her to offer a better range of products to her customers. Chi hopes her business will run smoothly and that she can earn additional income to reinvest in her shop and to save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase more products, such as food, soaps, washing powder and shampoos

loans.name: María Salvadora

texts.es:
Doña María Salvadora es originaria de la comarca La Palma ubicado a 7 km del municipio de El sauce, es un caserío rodeado de montañas florecidas y ríos caudalosos y a pesar que su población es muy pequeña son unidas que trabajan por el bien de la comunidad.

Con actitud de luchadora y trabajadora se desempeña esta señora valiente que a pesar de su edad de 56 años hace el esfuerzo de trabajar día a día para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.

Su negocio consiste en la venta de ropa para todo tipo donde tiene 34 años de dedicarse a este oficio y el que le permitió preparar profesionalmente a su hijo.

Diario se levanta a las 5 de la mañana para poder salir de manera ambulante visita casa por casa caminando en dicha comarca para ofrecer sus productos a los posibles compradores.

Debido a que se acerca la temporada escolar está solicitando un crédito para la compra de camisas escolares, pantalones escolares, faldas escolares, zapatos, ropa interior y pantalones de mujer, con el fin de satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Doña María Salvadora is native to La Palma district located 7 km from the municipality of El Sauce. The region is a hamlet surrounded by flowering mountains and deep rivers, and despite the fact that its population is very small they are united in working for the well-being of the community.

This brave woman carries herself with a feisty and hardworking attitude. Despite her age of 56 years, every day she makes the effort to work to help her husband with the household expenses.

Her business consists of selling clothes for all types. She has made a living in this trade for 34 years, and this work has allowed her to prepare her son professionally.

She rises daily at 5 in the morning to go out and make visits from house to house, walking through the district to offer her products to potential buyers.

Since the school season is approaching, she is requesting a loan for the purchase of school shirts, school trousers, school skirts, shoes, underwear and pants for women, in order to satisfy the demand of her customers.

loans.use: to buy school shirts, school trousers, school skirts, shoes, underwear and pants for women

loans.name: Posyano

texts.en:
Posyano is a married man aged 49 with five children, living in Kagadi, Uganda. He operates a produce business which he has run for ten years now. He also sells alcohol in order to earn a living. He dreams of buying a lorry to help him in the transportation of produce despite challenges of inadequate capital that affect his business growth. 

Posyano is requesting a loan to buy maize and coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Marekh

texts.en:
Marekh, 39 years old, is from the small village of Tsnori. She is divorced and lives with her mother and her two children, 15 and 12 years old, both attending the local school. The family's only sources of income are the small monthly salary earned by Marekh working in a store as a saleslady and Marekh’s mother's retirement pension. This income is hardly enough to cover the family's food and everyday expenses. On several occasions, Marekh requested a loan from local financial institutions for starting a trading business, but she had no success. Her loan requests were always rejected because of her low income and lack of job experience, criteria usually demanded by the local credit providers.

Marekh's loan request was approved in the framework of a new joint initiative through Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to the country's rural poor, who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income.

Marekh will purchase stocks of clothes in Tbilisi (the capital city) for wholesale prices and resell them in her village for a profit. It will be hard work for Marekh, but according to her estimations, the business will be profitable and increase the family's income. The increased profit will be reinvested in the business to increase her stock and sales volume. Family members will be able to increase their spending to satisfy their daily needs in order to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace, 33 years old, lives in Montrserrado County, which has the highest production of fish in the Liberian market. She is married and has four children  aged between 2 and 15 years old, all in school and living at home. For five years, Grace has been selling used clothes in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband and learned this trade from her mother. Grace is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. She hopes to build a house and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Olive

texts.en: Olive is 45 years old and lives in Montrserrado County which is the highest production area of fish on the Liberian market. She is married with four children between 20 and 30 years old; only one lives at home and is in school. For three years now she has been selling frozen chicken, pig's feet, chicken feet, etc. in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her mother and learned this trade from her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more frozen chicken, pig's feet, chicken feet, etc. for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more frozen chicken, pig's feet, chicken feet, etc. for her business

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 23 years old and married with one child.  She has been selling shoes and cosmetics in Voi, Kenya for the last two years.  Her income is great and her husband provides additional income.  

With this loan she will stock ladies’ shoes  and cosmetics and use the anticipated profit to expand her business.  She hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and shoes for her shop.

loans.name: Rosa Vilma

texts.es:
Rosa, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para la compra de mas mercadería para el negocio, tenerlo surtido para atender mejor a los clientes, ella solicita para comprarse arroz, frijoles, aceite, gaseosas, refrescos, boquitas, esto le ayudara para que su familia este en mejor condición.
Ella manifiesta que trabajar con préstamos, le permite crecer y tener más variedad de productos, sus circunstancias familiares han mejorado, viviendo con mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Rosa decided to request a new loan in order to buy more merchandise for her business. Having inventory will allow her to provide better service to her customers. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy rice, beans, oil, sodas, soft drinks, and snack foods. This will help her to provide better conditions for her family.

Rosa says that working with loans has enabled her to grow and have a wider variety of products. Her family’s circumstances have improved since they are able to live with more income.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, sodas, soft drinks, and snack foods.

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en: Hanh, 35 years old, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. For the past 6 years, Hanh and her husband have run a business selling cellphone cards. Hanh intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of cellphone cards from different cellphone service providers to sell to her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a variety of cellphone cards from different service providers

loans.name: Hai

texts.en:
Hai is a 44-year-old married man living in Ho Chi Minh City. He has two children. 

Hai and his wife earn a living running a general store, which they have done for four years. Hai would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as toothpaste, foods and beverages, to stock his general store. 

Hai hopes this will enable him to better meet the needs of his customers and increase the turnover of his business. He also hopes that through the loan, his business will generate a higher income and will help him to improve his family's living conditions and enable him to set aside some savings.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as toothpaste, foods and beverages, to stock his general store.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. 

Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store.

loans.name: Lang

texts.en: Lang is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products such as shampoo packs and confectionery to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales. It will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of new products, such as shampoo packs and confectionery

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a 49-year-old married woman living in Ho Chi Minh City. She has two sons. She and her husband earn a living running a general store, which they have done for nine years. 

Thuy would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as foods, confectionery, and soft drinks, to stock her general store. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. 

Thuy also hopes that through the loan, her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as foods, confectionery, and soft drinks, to stock her general store.

loans.name: Norah

texts.en: Norah is 36 years old and lives in Montrserrado County, which has the highest production of fish on the Liberian market. She is married with three children between 6 and 13 years old who live at home and are in school. She has been selling flour, sugar, fresh milk, tea, bread, etc in her community. She started this business with money given to her by her mother and learned this trade from her. She is requesting a loan to purchase more flour, sugar, fresh milk, tea, bread, etc for her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, fresh milk, tea, bread etc for her business.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a married man with four children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He operates a produce business that he has run for 10 years now. He also operates a spare parts business, which supplements the produce. He dreams of buying a lorry to help him in the transportation to different markets, despite inadequate capital that affects his business growth. James is requesting a loan to buy maize and coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and coffee to sell.

loans.name: John Bosco

texts.en:
John Bosco is a 33-year-old, married man, with four children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He is a primary head teacher and has been in service for a period of ten years. He was inspired into the profession by the conduct of teachers and, with his meager salary, he has been able to educate his children. 

In order to meet the daily expenses of the family, he decided to set up a produce business and also a video hall. These have proven to be very lucrative. John Bosco intends to use the loan to buy groundnuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts to sell.

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en:
Hanh, a 56-year-old married woman, lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She has three children, two sons and one daughter. She runs a business that sells clothes-making materials to people in the local community. 

Hanh requests a loan to purchase more products, such as cloth, needles, and thread, to stock her store. This will enable her to offer a better range of products to her customers. 

Hanh hopes her business will run smoothly, and that she can earn additional income to reinvest in her shop and save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase more products, such as cloth, needles, and thread, to stock her store

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
This is 35-year-old Moses from Waterloo in the eastern area of Freetown. He is a father of one child age three years old. He started his business because he wanted a permanent source of income to support his home.

Moses runs a clothing business. He sells jeans, blouses and T-shirts. He has been running this business for eight years. He works at the business from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm, 7 days per week. His business is the only income he has. He is facing problems of inadequate capital and price inflation. He is a hardworking man who desires to improve his business.

Moses has requested a loan in order to buy more clothing like jeans, blouses and T-shirts. The extra income from this loan will allow him to start a savings account. In the future, he plans to import goods from neighboring countries. He appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy more clothing like jeans, blouses and T-shirts.

loans.name: Ly

texts.en: Ly is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products such as sugar and confectionery to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store, increasing sales, and helping her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of new products, such as sugar and confectionery

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
Meet 25-year-old Isatu from Waterloo, eastern area in Freetown. She is married, with two children, one and three years old. 

In 2007, Isatu established her general merchandise business. She began her business because she needed to create permanent income to support the home. She works at the business from 7:00am until 6:30pm, seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is the problem of transportation.

Isatu requires a loan in order to buy different kinds of commodities like flour, Maggi, tomato paste, and rice. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and educate her children. In the future, Isatu plans to become a distributor. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of commodities for her business like flour, Maggi, tomato paste, and rice.

loans.name: Liliana Marcela

texts.es:
Liliana de 24 años de edad, es una joven que ha tenido que buscar alternativas para salir adelante. Su familia es lo más importante para ella, por lo cual se ha esforzado por suministrarles a sus padres y a su hijo de tres años de edad, alimentación y vivienda.
Con pocas oportunidades de emplearse, debido a su bajo nivel educativo, esta mujer encontró una gran oportunidad para crear su propio negocio. Gracias al aprendizaje que adquirió por medio de una amiga, esta mujer elabora calzado y correas, los cuales distribuye en el centro de la ciudad. Esta actividad le ha permitido mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, por lo cual desea incrementar su capacidad de producción a fin de garantizarle a su hijo educación y una vida digna a sus padres.
Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima (cuero) e insumos para la fabricación de sus productos.
texts.en:
Liliana, 24, is a young person who has had to look for alternatives to get ahead.  Her family is what is most important to her; she's worked hard to provide her parents and her 3 year-old child with food and shelter.

With few job opportunities, due to her lack of education, Liliana found a great opportunity to start her own business. Thanks to a friend, who taught her some skills, Liliana makes shoes and belts which she sells in the center of the city.  This activity has allowed her to improve her family's living conditions. Liliana wants to increase her production capacity so that she can guarantee that her child gets an education, and that her parents can live a decent life.  

For this reason, Liliana is requesting a loan to buy raw materials (leather) and supplies to make her products.

loans.use: to buy leather and glue

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Meet 28-year-old Mohamed from Waterloo, an eastern area in Freetown. He is a father of one child, age 3 years. In 2008, Mohamed established his general merchandise business. He began his business because he wants to create income to support his family. He works at the business every day, from morning to night. He says that the main challenge to his business is the high cost of renting the shop.

Mohamed requires a loan in order to buy general stock, like a television, some malt, a generator, and packet hair. He hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow him to increase his business and improve his status. In the future, Mohamed plans to expand his business at a higher level. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy general stock, like a television, some malt, a generator, and packet hair.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 30 years old and lives in Kakata, the capital city of Margibi County, an area which produces the most rubber in Liberia. Esther is married and has seven children between 3 and 15 years old. Only four of them live at home and go to school.

For ten years now, Esther has been selling charcoal in the local market. She started this business with capital given to her by her husband, and she learned this trade from her friends. She is requesting a loan to purchase more charcoal, to resell in her business. She hopes to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal, to resell in her business

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru:
Гулчахон жительница района Кумсангир. Она замужем. Ей 34 года. У нее один ребенок. Муж Гулчахон находится на заработках за рубежом. Гулчахон имеет среднее образование. 
Гулчахон занимается торговлей на рынке. Она арендует торговую точку, где занимается торговлей детской и женской одежды. Торговлей Гулчахон занимается 7 лет. Она берет кредит с целью увеличения оборота.
texts.en:
Guljahon lives in the Qumsangir region.  She is married.  She is 34 years old.  She has one child.  Guljahon's husband is earning money abroad.  Guljahon has a high school education.

Guljahon sells at the market.  She rents a sales location. where she sells children's and women's clothing.  Guljahon has been working in sales for 7 years.  She is taking out a loan to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal products

loans.name: Huyen

texts.en: Huyen is requesting a new loan to buy better food and ingredients for making soup, to sell to the people in her community. This purchase will help her to better attract and satisfy customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her food stall and increasing sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy better food and ingredients to make soup to sell, at her combination newsstand and food stall

loans.name: Nishonali

texts.ru: Нишонали молодой мужчина. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Нишонали занимается животноводством. У него имеется несколько коров и овец. Дополнительно он занимается перевозкой сена на своем грузовике. Основным доходом является откорм скота. Он покупает на рынке скотов скот и откармливая их два,три месяца,продает на том же рынке по дороже. Этот бизнес ему очень нравится и Нишонали от этого бизнеса получает хороший доход. Конечно же его жена его поддерживает и помогает ему. Нишонали хотя сам занимается животноводством он не хочет чтобы его дети пошли по его стопам и очень старается создать своим детям условие для учебы. Его мечта это обучить детей и чтобы его дети в будущем работали по профессии и были опорой для него в старости. Для развития бизнеса Нишонали планирует купить еще несколько голов скота и для этого он обратился в организацию Кива. Он запрашивает кредит для увеличения поголовье скота и расширения бизнеса. Очень надеется на финансовую поддержку и заранее благодарит.
texts.en: Nishonali is a young man.  He is married and has three children.  Nishonali raises livestock.  He has several cows and sheep.  In addition, he transports hay on his truck.  Raising livestock is his main source of income.  He purchases livestock at the market, fattens it for two to three months and sells it at the same market for more money.  He likes this business a lot and Nishonali earns a good income from this business.  Of course his wife supports and helps him.  While Nishonali raises livestock he does not want his children to follow in his footsteps and tries hard to set up good conditions for their studies.  His dream is to give his children an education so that in the future his children can have a profession and be a support for him in his old age.  In order to grow his business Nishonali plans to buy several more heads of livestock and he has turned to Kiva for this.  He is asking for a loan to increase his livestock count and to expand his business.  He hopes for your financial support and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
“En la vida existen momentos que se quedan para siempre en la memoria, recuerdos que tienen más valor que las piedras preciosas”. Con esta frase Luis Fernando de 59 años de edad, cuenta que es lo que más ama, después de su familia. Su gran pasión es la escritura, y esta es una de las frases que este hombre plasma en su cuaderno de poemas. Aunque esta es su gran pasión, este hombre se dedica a otras actividades a fin de suplir las necesidades básicas en su hogar. 
Desde hace 25 años labora en un pequeño taller ubicado al lado de su casa prestando el servicio de restauración y pintura de muebles. 
Luis es un hombre lleno de sueños,  desea poder llegar a escribir un libro, pero sobre todo tener buenos ingresos para gozar de una buena vejez sin necesidades económicas. 	Motivado por este deseo, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de un compresor, con el fin de mejorar la productividad y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: “There are moments in life that stay in our memory forever, memories that are more valuable than precious gems.”  With this phrase, Luis Fernando, 59, relates that this is what he loves most aside from his family.  His great passion is writing and this is one of the phrases he keeps in his poetry notebook.  Although this is his great passion, he carries out other activities in order to meet basic household needs.  For the last 25 years he’s been working in a small paint workshop located at the side of his house where he restores and paints furniture.  Luis is a man who is full of dreams; he’d like to write a book someday but above all to earn good income to enjoy his old age with no economic wants.  Motivated by this wish, he’s asking for a loan to buy an air compressor to improve productivity and income.

loans.use: to buy an air compressor to paint furniture.

loans.name: Dania María

texts.es:
Dania María es originaria del Sauce, un poblado ubicado al occidente de León entre medio de montañas verdes y florecidas donde predomina la miel y la leche.

Doña Dania es madre de tres hijos en edad escolar, inició su negocio con un pequeño capital que le obsequió su esposo con el fin de que generara sus propios ingresos vendiendo cosméticos, hoy en la actualidad ha crecido en cuanto a la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes y la línea de los mismos como son los cosméticos de la Avon, zermat, oriflame, prendas de oro y de plata.

Como mujer emprendedora y luchadora diario visita a pie a sus posibles compradores para ofrecerle lo nuevo de los productos.

Actualmente está incursionando en una nueva línea de productos de limpieza el cual le está dando resultado por la calidad de los mismos por lo que necesita capital para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y comprar productos de limpieza y cosméticos.

Solicita a los inversionistas de Kiva y Ceprodel y le apoyen con su solicitud ya que es la única manera de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Dania is a native of El Sauce, a town located to the west of León between the green flowering mountains where milk and honey prevail. 

Dania is a mother of three school-aged children. She began her business with the intention of generating her own income by selling cosmetics with a small amount of capital that her husband gave to her. Currently, the business has grown in regard to the variety of products that it offers to customers, including Avon, Zermat, and Oriflame cosmetics, and gold and silver jewelry.

As an enterprising and determined women, she goes on foot to meet possible buyers to offer them the newest products daily.

Currently, she is investing in a new line of cleaning products which are giving good results due to their quality; for this reason, she needs capital to supply the demand of her customers and buy cleaning and cosmetic products.

She asking the Kiva and CEPRODEL lenders that they support her with her request since it is the only manner of being able to grow and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products and cosmetics.

loans.name: Luis Ivan

texts.es:
Luis Iván de 25 años de edad, es un campesino dedicado a la agricultura desde su infancia. Su padre fue su mentor, debido a que esta actividad ha sido por generaciones la fuente de sustento para su familia. Gracias a la experiencia adquirida durante años de trabajo, este joven decidió aplicar sus conocimientos y sacarle provecho a lo que mejor sabe hacer, realizó un invernadero en donde tiene sembrados de tomate de aliño. Con esta idea de negocio, Luis espera poder mejorar sus ingresos y garantizarle a su hijo de dos años de edad una buena educación y un libre desarrollo.
Su mayor sueño es poder adquirir su propio terreno y mejorar su calidad de vida. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un  crédito para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como abonos, insecticidas y fungicidas. Desea que esta inversión le permita mejorar la productividad de su cultivo.
texts.en:
Luis Iván, 25, has been working in agriculture since his infancy.  His father was his mentor because this activity has been his family’s source of support for generations.  Thanks to the experience gained during his years working, this young man decided to apply his skills to gain the most advantage out of what he knows how to do best.  He built a nursery where he’s planted tomatoes for dressing.  With this business idea, Luis hopes to improve his income and guarantee a good education and trouble-free growth for his two-year-old son.

His greatest dream is to acquire his own land and improve his quality of life.  He’s currently asking for a loan to buy farm supplies like manure, insecticide and fungicide.  He hopes this investment will make it possible for him to improve his crop yields.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to renovate his residential house, which he could not do without the loan because of his low salary as a teacher.

loans.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz Amparo tiene 57 años de edad, desde hace 30 años se dedica al arte de las artesanías y los bordados, oficio que aprendió gracias a su madre y el cual le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus seis hijos. Después de realizar las labores hogareñas, Luz coge su aguja y se sienta a bordar a fin de poder cumplirle a su clientela con los encargos que le solicitan. Ama su trabajo y asegura que es su gran pasatiempo. Sus artículos se han vuelto tan populares que diariamente la visitan para solicitarle cocines, centros de mesa entre otros. 
Debido a que sus pedidos se han aumentado, Luz se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una máquina con el propósito de realizar algunas de las actividades que hace a mano con el fin de agilizar en la entrega de sus pedidos.
Su mayor sueño es poder crear su propio taller y convertirse en una generadora de empleo en su localidad, al tiempo que puede enseñarles a otras personas su gran habilidad para bordar.
texts.en:
Luz Amparo, 57, has worked in the arts of crafts making and embroidery for 30 years.  She learned this occupation from her mother and this has made it possible for her to raise her six children.  After doing her household chores, Luz takes up her needle and sits down to embroider in order to fill pending customer orders.  She loves her work and insists that it’s a great pastime.  Her items have become so popular that she’s visited daily with requests for cushions, table runners, etc.

Because her orders have increased, Luz is asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine to do some of the tasks she does by hand in order to do the work more easily and fill orders faster.

Her greatest dream is to set up her own workshop and become an employment generator in her location while teaching others her great embroidery skills.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a hard-working and business-oriented woman. She is married and has two children. Both of her children currently go to school.

Luzviminda's and her husband's primary business involvement is in agriculture, particularly corn farming and hog raising. She manages three hectares of corn and raises one sow and three fattening hogs. According to her, she has been running her agricultural business since 1999. With her patience and the support of her husband, they were able to improve their financial stability and established another business, which is a variety store.

Her variety store has been open for two years. Luzviminda plans to buy stocks of merchandise, such as canned goods, shampoo, bar soap, soft drinks, sugar, coffee and assorted biscuits. But due to having had insufficient funds to fully stock the store, she is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000. She knows that through re-stocking her variety store with a complete set of basic commodities, she could gain more income.  Also she will reduce her costs, because now she has high fare expenses in going to and from the market where she buys inventory, because her place is too far from the market. 

Luzviminda hopes that she will obtain this loan amount, and use it for profit, which will help her to educate her two children and continue to improve her financial stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to resell in her variety store, such as canned goods, shampoo, soap, soft drinks, sugar, coffee and assorted biscuits

loans.name: Lawrence

texts.en: Lawrence is a married man, aged 35, and a father to six children. He lives in Kagadi, Uganda. Due to his passion for agriculture, he started a produce business seven years ago. He has been able to build rental houses to supplement his income and also has continued to do farming. He dreams of educating his six children and buying a vehicle. Weather and bad roads affect his business. Lawrence is requesting a loan to buy beans and maize to sell.

loans.use: To buy beans and maize to sell

loans.name: María Eugenia

texts.es:
María de 47 años de edad, es una mujer que le ha tocado padecer las inclemencias del frío, la lluvia y el hambre. Desde hace 23 años se dedica a la venta ambulante de jugo de naranja en el centro de la ciudad de Medellín, Colombia. Después de que su esposo la abandonara, dejándola con 4 hijos, esta mujer tuvo que guerrear la vida a fin de conseguir el sustento para su hogar. Gracias a la iniciativa de una amiga que la animó y le facilitó el capital para iniciar con su actividad, ella ha podido triunfar con mucho sacrificio. 
Su mayor sueño es poder brindarle a su hijo menor la oportunidad de ingresar a la universidad ya que desea que el tenga mejores oportunidades de vida y se convierta en un gran profesional.
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará para la reparación de su carro en donde transporta sus bebidas y compra de insumos. Espera que su condición económica mejore para garantizarles a sus hijos una  mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, 47, is a woman who has had to withstand cold, rain and hunger.  For the last 23 year she’s worked selling orange juice from place to place in downtown Medellín, Colombia.  After her husband abandoned her leaving her with four children, she had to struggle in life in order to find a way to provide sustenance for her home.  Thanks to a girlfriend’s initiative who encouraged her and lent her capital to start her activity, she’s been able to succeed thanks to much sacrifice.

Her greatest dream is to be able to provide her youngest son with the opportunity of entering the university because she wants him to have better life opportunities and become a great professional.

She’s currently asking for a loan to repair the cart she uses to transport her beverages and to buy ingredients.  She hopes her economic situation will improve in order to guarantee a better quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to repair her food cart and to buy fruit.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca lives in Kakata Town, the capital City of Margibi County, which is the highest-producing rubber plantation in Liberia. She is 31 years old, married and has two children, aged 9 and 14. Both children are in school and live at home 

Rebecca did not go to school, but she is good at managing her business. For the past seven years, she has been selling palm oil, pepper, rice, etc. in the local market. She started this business with help from her husband and learned this way of selling from her friends.

Rebecca is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil, pepper, rice, etc. for her business. She enjoys her business because of the profit she receives every day. Her plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, pepper, rice, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Deshzeveg

texts.en: Mr. Dashzeveg is 69 years old and lives with his wife in a small house in the Huvsgul province of Mongolia. His wife, Davaajii, age 70, is retired and stays home. He worked in a state-owned organization for years and retired several years ago. He and his wife cover their expenses from their pensions. He is now starting his own business of poultry breeding on their plot of land. He used to help with his children's business, so he knows a lot about business. He is now requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase a special breed of poultry for his newly started business. He is a hardworking, tough, and energetic man.

loans.use: To purchase a special breed of poultry for his newly started business

loans.name: Jesus Salvador

texts.es:
Jesús, tiene 37 años de edad, está casado, su esposa tiene 37 años, tiene tres hijos están menores de edad y se encuentran estudiando, él administra una sorbetería, tiene aproximadamente 15 años de poseerla, tiene ocho empleados quienes vender el sorbete en las afueras de la ciudad.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de paletas, sorbetes de variedad de sabores, pues esta compra le servirá para mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio, ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios para seguir vendiendo.
La aspiracion de Jesus es crecer en el negocio, ya que a través de él su familia se alimenta y podrá estar mejor económicamente.
texts.en:
Jesus, 37, is married and his wife is also 37 years old.  They have three children that are all minors and are in schooling.  He manages a sorbet [ice cream] shop, which he has owned for approximately 15 years.  He has eight employees who sell the sorbet on the outskirts of the city.
He is requesting a loan for the purchase of pallets and sorbets in a variety of flavors.  These purchases will allow him to improve the availability of his business and increase his inventory for uninterrupted sales.  Jesus dreams of growing the business, as it what sustains his family, and becoming more financially secure.

loans.use: to buy pallets and sorbets in a variety of flavors.

loans.name: María Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita de 56 años de edad, dedicó gran parte de su vida a cuidar de su hijo, ya que le tocó ser madre soltera por circunstancias del destino. Laboró por muchos años en casas de familia, pero cansada de no recibir el pago justo por su labor decidió retirarse y aprender el oficio de la confección. Cuando desarrolló su potencial, compró con sus ahorros una maquina de coser con la que inició su proyecto de negocio. Inició realizando costuras a sus vecinos y familiares. Ahora es muy conocida en su localidad y el trabajo ha aumentado, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de una maquina plana que le permitirá mejorar la calidad en su servicio y generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar.

Su mayor sueño es poder montar un taller de confección directa que le permita mejorar sus ingresos económicos y colaborarles a sus hijos para la educación de sus nietos. Asegura que su familia es lo más importante en su vida y por ellos cualquier sacrificio vale la pena.
texts.en:
Margarita, 56, spent a great part of her life caring for her son since her lot was being a single mother due to fate’s circumstances.  She worked for many years in family homes but tired of not earning a fair wage for her work she decided to retire from that and learn dressmaking.  When she realized her potential, she used her savings to buy a sewing machine she used to start her business venture.  She started out doing sewing for her neighbors and family members.  Now, she’s very well-known in her location and work has increased which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy a straight-stitch sewing machine that will make it possible for her to improve service and generate more household income.

Her greatest dream is to set up a sewing workshop to do contract sewing that will increase income so she can help her children pay for her grandchildren’s schooling.  She insists that her family is the most important thing in her life and any sacrifice for them is well worth it.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Bulgamaa

texts.en:
Mrs. Bulgamaa is 42 years old and lives with her husband and son in a ger (traditional Mongolian housing) in the Arhangai province of Mongolia. Her husband, Batdorj, age 49, runs a taxi service business in town. Her two older daughters are married and live separately from them. Her son, Dembereldodov, age 11, studies at a local school. 

Bulgamaa has been running an organic dairy products sales business in a local market since 2004. She has gained a lot of experience and regular customers over the years. 

Bulgamaa is now requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products to sell to local customers during the Lunar New Year season. She is a hardworking and welcoming woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of organic dairy products to sell to local customers during the Lunar New Year season.

loans.name: María Nubia

texts.es:
María de 46 años de edad, es una mujer que se caracteriza por su responsabilidad y amabilidad para tratar a sus clientes. Desde hace 10 años es estilista, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y perfeccionó gracias a la oportunidad que tuvo de ingresar a una academia de belleza.
Labora todos los días de nueve de la mañana a 8 de la noche en compañía con una de sus tres hijas, las cuales son su mayor razón para salir adelante. Desea poderles brindar acceso a la educación superior, por lo cual se esfuerza por generar el mayor número de clientes y obtener mejores ingresos.

En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de lava-cabezas y surtido en general, para ofrecer una mejorar calidad en el servicio.
Su mayor reto es la gran competencia que existe en su municipio por lo cual considera que la mejor ventaja comparativa es la buena atención.
texts.en:
María, 46, is a woman noted for her responsibility and kind way of treating customers.  She’s been a stylist for ten years, an activity she learned empirically and perfected thanks to the opportunity she had of entering a beauty academy.

She works every day from nine in the morning until eight at night with one of her daughters; they are her greatest reason for moving forward.  She wants to provide them with higher education which is why she strives to generate the largest possible number of customers and earn higher income.

She’s currently asking for a loan to buy a hair-washing sink and supplies in general to provide better quality of service.  Her greatest challenge is the high level of competition in her town which is why she feels that her competitive edge is good service.

loans.use: to buy a sink and supplies.

loans.name: María Nohemi

texts.es:
María es una mujer que se ha ganado el aprecio y el respeto de sus vecinos, gracias a su bondad y las ganas de sacar a sus dos hijos menores de edad adelante.
Aunque es ama de casa  y sus hijos son su mayor prioridad, esta mujer también sueña con convertirse en una microempresaria, por lo cual ya inició con su proyecto de negocio. En la sala de su casa ubicó una pequeña estantería en donde vende artículos de papelería, aprovechando la cercanía de una escuela en su sector. De esta manera le colabora a su esposo con los gastos, al tiempo que les brinda a sus hijos una mejor estabilidad. 
Su mayor sueño es poder adecuar su papelería, por lo cual, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una vitrina y útiles escolares para la temporada estudiantil. 
Lo más importante para ella es su familia, por eso desea poder garantizarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María’s a woman who has won over her neighbors’ affection and respect thanks to her kindness and drive to move her two minor children forward.  Although she’s a housewife and her children are her greatest priority, she dreams with becoming a micro businesswoman which is why she’s already started her business venture.  She set up some shelving in her living room where she sells stationery supplies taking advantage of her location near a school.  In this way, she helps her husband cover expenses while providing better stability for her children.

Her greatest wish is to be able to furnish her stationery shop which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy a display case and school supplies for the school term.  Her family is most important to her which is why she wants to guarantee a better quality of life for them.

loans.use: to buy a display case and school supplies.

loans.name: Adil

texts.en:
